title: Normed algebraic structures
content: In the following, the norm of a normed algebraic structure (group, left module, vector space) is defined by the (given) distance function (the norm ` N ` of an element is its distance ` D ` from the zero element, see ~ nmval : ` ( N `` A ) = ( A D .0. ) `). By this definition, the norm function ` N ` is actually a norm (satisfying the properties of being a function into the reals, subadditivity/triangle inequality ( n(x+y) <_ n(x)+n(y) ), absolute homogeneity ( n(sx) = |s| n(x) ) [Remark: for group norms, some authors (e.g. Juris Steprans in "A characterization of free abelian groups") demand that n(sx) = |s| n(x) for all s in ZZ, whereas other authors (e.g. N. H. Bingham and A. J. Ostaszewski in "Normed versus topological groups: Dichotomy and duality") only require inversion symmetry, i.e. n(-x) = n(x). The definition ~ df-ngp of a group norm follows the second aproach, see ~ nminv .] and positive definiteness/point-separating ( n(x) = 0 <-> x = 0 ) if the structure is a metric space with a right-translation-invariant metric (see ~ nmf , ~ nmtri , ~ nmvs and ~ nmeq0 ). An alternate definition of a normed group (i.e. a group equipped with a norm) without using the properties of a metric space is given by theorem ~ tngngp3 . For a structure being a group, the (arbitrary) distance function can be restricted to the elements of the group without affecting the norm, see ~ nmfval2 . Usually, however, the norm of a normed structure is given, and the corresponding metric ("induced metric") is achieved by defining a distance function based on the norm (the distance ` D ` between two elements is the norm ` N ` of their difference, see ~ ngpds : ` ( A D B ) = ( N `` ( A .- B ) ) ` ). The operation ` toNrmGrp ` does exactly this, i.e. it adds a distance function (and a topology) to a structure (which should be at least a group) corresponding to a given norm in the just shown way: ` ( dist `` T ) = ( N o. .- ) ` , see also ~ tngds . By this, the enhanced structure becomes a normed structure if the induced metric is in fact a metric (see ~ tngngp2 ) resp. if the norm is in fact a norm (see ~ tngngpd ). If the norm is derived from a given metric, as done with ~ df-nm , the induced metric is the original metric restricted to the base set: ` ( dist `` T ) = ( ( dist `` G ) |`` ( X X. X ) ) `, see ~ nrmtngdist , and the norm remains the same: ` ( norm `` T ) = ( norm `` G ) `, see ~ nrmtngnrm .

df-nm
blocks.content: Define the norm on a group or ring (when it makes sense) in terms of the distance to zero. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Oct-2015.)

blocks.name: df-ngp
blocks.content: Define a normed group, which is a group with a right-translation-invariant metric. This is not a standard notion, but is helpful as the most general context in which a metric-like norm makes sense. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Oct-2015.)

blocks.name: df-tng
blocks.content: Define a function that fills in the topology and metric components of a structure given a group and a norm on it. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Oct-2015.)

blocks.name: df-nrg
blocks.content: A normed ring is a ring with an induced topology and metric such that the metric is translation-invariant and the norm (distance from 0) is an absolute value on the ring. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Oct-2015.)

blocks.name: df-nlm
blocks.content: A normed (left) module is a module which is also a normed group over a normed ring, such that the norm distributes over scalar multiplication. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Oct-2015.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-nlm(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  |- wceq(cnlm, crab(s0, cin(cngp, clmod), wsbc(s1, cfv(csca, cv(s0)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cnrg), wral(s2, cfv(cbs, cv(s1)), wral(s3, cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(cfv(cnm, cv(s0)), co(cv(s2), cfv(cvsca, cv(s0)), cv(s3))), co(cfv(cfv(cnm, cv(s1)), cv(s2)), cmul, cfv(cfv(cnm, cv(s0)), cv(s3))))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
}

blocks.name: df-nvc
blocks.content: A normed vector space is a normed module which is also a vector space. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Oct-2015.)

thm nmfval(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {

  -| wceq(c3, cfv(c0g, c4))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cds, c4))
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
} = {
  a1ii(wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, c1, co(cv(s0), c2, c3))), diffsc(s0, c3))
  eqtri(c0, cmpt(s0, c1, co(cv(s0), c2, c3)), cfv(cnm, c4))
  pm2.61i(wceq(cfv(cnm, c4), cmpt(s0, c1, co(cv(s0), c2, c3))), wcel(c4, universe))
  fvmpt(hs0, c4, universe, cnm, cmpt(s0, c1, co(cv(s0), c2, c3)), cmpt(s0, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), co(cv(s0), cfv(cds, cv(hs0)), cfv(c0g, cv(hs0)))))
  mpteq12dv(s0, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), co(cv(s0), cfv(cds, cv(hs0)), cfv(c0g, cv(hs0))), c1, co(cv(s0), c2, c3), wceq(cv(hs0), c4))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), c1, cfv(cbs, c4), wceq(cv(hs0), c4))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c4, cbs)
  oveq123d(cv(s0), cfv(cds, cv(hs0)), cfv(c0g, cv(hs0)), cv(s0), c2, c3, wceq(cv(hs0), c4))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cds, cv(hs0)), c2, cfv(cds, c4), wceq(cv(hs0), c4))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c4, cds)
  eqidd(cv(s0), wceq(cv(hs0), c4))
  syl6eqr(cfv(c0g, cv(hs0)), c3, cfv(c0g, c4), wceq(cv(hs0), c4))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c4, c0g)
  df-nm(hs0, s0)
  mp3an(wcel(cmpt(s0, c1, co(cv(s0), c2, c3)), universe), wf(cmpt(s0, c1, co(cv(s0), c2, c3)), c1, cun(crn(c2), csn(emptycls))), wcel(c1, universe), wcel(cun(crn(c2), csn(emptycls)), universe))
  fmpti(s0, cmpt(s0, c1, co(cv(s0), c2, c3)), c1, cun(crn(c2), csn(emptycls)), co(cv(s0), c2, c3))
  eqid(cmpt(s0, c1, co(cv(s0), c2, c3)))
  a1i(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(co(cv(s0), c2, c3), cun(crn(c2), csn(emptycls))))
  eqeltri(co(cv(s0), c2, c3), cun(crn(c2), csn(emptycls)), cfv(c2, cop(cv(s0), c3)))
  df-ov(cv(s0), c2, c3)
  fvrn0(c2, cop(cv(s0), c3))
  fvexi(c1, cbs, c4)
  unex(crn(c2), csn(emptycls))
  rnex(c2)
  fvexi(c2, cds, c4)
  p0ex()
  fex2(cmpt(s0, c1, co(cv(s0), c2, c3)), c1, cun(crn(c2), csn(emptycls)), universe, universe)
  eqtr4d(cfv(cnm, c4), cmpt(s0, c1, co(cv(s0), c2, c3)), cmpt(s0, emptycls, co(cv(s0), c2, c3)), wn(wcel(c4, universe)))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cnm, c4), cmpt(s0, emptycls, co(cv(s0), c2, c3)), emptycls, wn(wcel(c4, universe)))
  fvprc(c4, cnm)
  mpt0(s0, co(cv(s0), c2, c3))
  mpteq1d(s0, c1, co(cv(s0), c2, c3), emptycls, wn(wcel(c4, universe)))
  syl5eq(c1, emptycls, cfv(cbs, c4), wn(wcel(c4, universe)))
  fvprc(c4, cbs)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c(cmpt(s0, c1, co(cv(s0), c2, c3)))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c4)

thm nmfval(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ‚ä¢ c0 =(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶(s0[c2]c3))
  ‚ä£ c0 =(norm ` c4)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(Base ` c4)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(0 ` c4)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(dist ` c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c4)
} = {
  a1ii(c0 =(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶(s0[c2]c3)), d(s0, c3))
  eqtri(c0, (s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶(s0[c2]c3)), (norm ` c4))
  pm2.61i((norm ` c4)=(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶(s0[c2]c3)), c4 ‚àà ùïå)
  fvmpt(hs0, c4, universe, cnm, (s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶(s0[c2]c3)), (s0 ‚àà(Base ` hs0)‚Ü¶(s0[(dist ` hs0)](0 ` hs0))))
  mpteq12dv(s0, (Base ` hs0), (s0[(dist ` hs0)](0 ` hs0)), c1, (s0[c2]c3), hs0 = c4)

  fveq2(hs0, c4, cds)
  eqidd(s0, hs0 = c4)
  syl6eqr((0 ` hs0), c3, (0 ` c4), hs0 = c4)
  fveq2(hs0, c4, c0g)

  mp3an((s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶(s0[c2]c3))‚àà ùïå, ((s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶(s0[c2]c3)): c1 ‚Üí(ran(c2)‚ãÉ { ‚àÖ })), c1 ‚àà ùïå, (ran(c2)‚ãÉ { ‚àÖ })‚àà ùïå)
  fmpti(s0, (s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶(s0[c2]c3)), c1, (ran(c2)‚ãÉ { ‚àÖ }), (s0[c2]c3))
  eqid((s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶(s0[c2]c3)))
  a1i(s0 ‚àà c1, (s0[c2]c3)‚àà(ran(c2)‚ãÉ { ‚àÖ }))
  eqeltri((s0[c2]c3), (ran(c2)‚ãÉ { ‚àÖ }), (c2 ` < s0, c3 >))
  df-ov(s0, c2, c3)
  fvrn0(c2, < s0, c3 >)
  fvexi(c1, cbs, c4)
  unex(ran(c2), { ‚àÖ })
  rnex(c2)
  fvexi(c2, cds, c4)
  p0ex()
  fex2((s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶(s0[c2]c3)), c1, (ran(c2)‚ãÉ { ‚àÖ }), universe, universe)
  eqtr4d((norm ` c4), (s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶(s0[c2]c3)), (s0 ‚àà ‚àÖ ‚Ü¶(s0[c2]c3)), ¬¨ c4 ‚àà ùïå)
  syl6eqr((norm ` c4), (s0 ‚àà ‚àÖ ‚Ü¶(s0[c2]c3)), emptycls, ¬¨ c4 ‚àà ùïå)
  fvprc(c4, cnm)

blocks.name: nmval
blocks.content: The value of the norm function. Problem 1 of [Kreyszig] p. 63. (Contributed by NM, 4-Dec-2006.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 2-Oct-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm nmval(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(c2, c0), co(c0, c3, c4)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cnm, c5))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c5))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(c0g, c5))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cds, c5))
} = {
  fvmpt(hs0, c0, c1, c2, co(c0, c3, c4), co(cv(hs0), c3, c4))
  oveq1(cv(hs0), c0, c3, c4)
  nmfval(hs0, c2, c1, c3, c4, c5)
  ovex(c0, c3, c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(co(c0, c3, c4))
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm nmval(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí(c2 ` c0)=(c0[c3]c4))
  ‚ä£ c2 =(norm ` c5)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(Base ` c5)
  ‚ä£ c4 =(0 ` c5)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(dist ` c5)
} = {
  fvmpt(hs0, c0, c1, c2, (c0[c3]c4), (hs0[c3]c4))
  oveq1(hs0, c0, c3, c4)
  nmfval(hs0, c2, c1, c3, c4, c5)
  ovex(c0, c3, c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c((c0[c3]c4))
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
}

thm nmfval2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cgrp), wceq(c1, cmpt(s0, c2, co(cv(s0), c3, c4))))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cnm, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))

  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cds, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cres(c5, cxp(c2, c2)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
} = {
  syl5eq(c1, cmpt(s0, c2, co(cv(s0), c3, c4)), cmpt(s0, c2, co(cv(s0), c5, c4)), wcel(c0, cgrp))
  nmfval(s0, c1, c2, c5, c4, c0)
  mpteq2dva(s0, c2, co(cv(s0), c5, c4), co(cv(s0), c3, c4), wcel(c0, cgrp))
  syl5req(co(cv(s0), c5, c4), co(cv(s0), c3, c4), co(cv(s0), cres(c5, cxp(c2, c2)), c4), wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(cv(s0), c2)))
  oveqi(cv(s0), c3, c4, cres(c5, cxp(c2, c2)))
  syl2anr(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(cv(s0), c2), wceq(co(cv(s0), cres(c5, cxp(c2, c2)), c4), co(cv(s0), c5, c4)), wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(c4, c2))
  id(wcel(cv(s0), c2))
  grpidcl(c0, c4, c2)
  ovres(cv(s0), c2, c4, c2, c5)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, cgrp)
  diff.cgrp.s(s0)
}

thm nmval2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà Grp ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2)‚Üí(c3 ` c1)=(c1[c4]c5))

  eqtrd((c3 ` c1), (c1[c4]c5), (c1[c6]c5), (c0 ‚àà Grp ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2))
  adantl(c0 ‚àà Grp, c1 ‚àà c2, (c3 ` c1)=(c1[c6]c5))
  nmval(c1, c2, c3, c6, c5, c0)
  syl5req((c1[c6]c5), (c1[c4]c5), (c1[(c6 |`(c2 √ó c2))]c5), (c0 ‚àà Grp ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2))

  grpidcl(c0, c5, c2)

thm nmf2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {

thm isngp(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {

  3bitr4i(wcel(c0, cngp), w3a(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c0, cms), wss(ccom(c1, c2), c3)), wa(wcel(c0, cin(cgrp, cms)), wss(ccom(c1, c2), c3)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c0, cms)), wss(ccom(c1, c2), c3)))
  anbi1i(wcel(c0, cin(cgrp, cms)), wss(ccom(c1, c2), c3), wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c0, cms)))

  sseq12d(ccom(cfv(cnm, cv(hs0)), cfv(csg, cv(hs0))), cfv(cds, cv(hs0)), ccom(c1, c2), c3, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))

  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, cnm)
  syl6eqr(cfv(csg, cv(hs0)), c2, cfv(csg, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, csg)

thm isngp(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà NrmGrp ‚Üî(c0 ‚àà Grp ‚àß c0 ‚àà MetSp ‚àß(c1 ‚àò c2)‚äÜ c3))
  ‚ä£ c1 =(norm ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(-g ` c0)

blocks.name: isngp4
blocks.content: Express the property of being a normed group purely in terms of right-translation invariance of the metric instead of using the definition of norm (which itself uses the metric). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 29-Oct-2015.)

blocks.name: ngpinvds
blocks.content: Two elements are the same distance apart as their inverses. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Oct-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm ngpinvds(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c0, cabl)), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2))), wceq(co(cfv(c4, c1), c5, cfv(c4, c3)), co(c1, c5, c3)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cminusg, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cds, c0))
} = {
  3eqtr4d(co(cfv(c4, c1), c5, cfv(c4, c3)), co(c1, c5, c3), cfv(cfv(cnm, c0), co(cfv(c4, c3), cfv(csg, c0), cfv(c4, c1))), cfv(cfv(cnm, c0), co(c1, cfv(csg, c0), c3)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c0, cabl)), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2))))
  fveq2d(cfv(cnm, c0), co(cfv(c4, c3), cfv(csg, c0), cfv(c4, c1)), co(c1, cfv(csg, c0), c3), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c0, cabl)), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2))))
  ablsub2inv(c4, c3, cfv(csg, c0), c1, c2, c0, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c0, cabl)), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2))))
  simplr(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c0, cabl), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)))
  syl3anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c0, cabl)), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2))), wceq(co(cfv(c4, c1), c5, cfv(c4, c3)), cfv(cfv(cnm, c0), co(cfv(c4, c3), cfv(csg, c0), cfv(c4, c1)))), wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(cfv(c4, c1), c2), wcel(cfv(c4, c3), c2))
  syl2anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c0, cabl)), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2))), wcel(cfv(c4, c1), c2), wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2))
  grpinvcl(c0, c1, c2, c4)
  syl2anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c0, cabl)), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2))), wcel(cfv(c4, c3), c2), wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c3, c2))
  syl(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c0, cabl)), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2))), wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c0, cngp))
  ngpgrp(c0)
  grpinvcl(c0, c3, c2, c4)
  ngpdsr(c0, cfv(c4, c1), c2, cfv(c4, c3), c5, cfv(cnm, c0), cfv(csg, c0))
  syl3anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c0, cabl)), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2))), wceq(co(c1, c5, c3), cfv(cfv(cnm, c0), co(c1, cfv(csg, c0), c3))), wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2))
  simpll(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c0, cabl), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)))
  simprl(wa(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c0, cabl)), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2))
  simprr(wa(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c0, cabl)), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2))
  ngpds(c0, c1, c2, c3, c5, cfv(cnm, c0), cfv(csg, c0))

  eqid(cfv(csg, c0))
}

  syl2anc(((c0 ‚àà NrmGrp ‚àß c0 ‚àà Abel)‚àß(c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2)), (c4 ` c1)‚àà c2, c0 ‚àà Grp, c1 ‚àà c2)
  grpinvcl(c0, c1, c2, c4)
  syl2anc(((c0 ‚àà NrmGrp ‚àß c0 ‚àà Abel)‚àß(c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2)), (c4 ` c3)‚àà c2, c0 ‚àà Grp, c3 ‚àà c2)
  syl(((c0 ‚àà NrmGrp ‚àß c0 ‚àà Abel)‚àß(c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2)), c0 ‚àà Grp, c0 ‚àà NrmGrp)

  simpll(c0 ‚àà NrmGrp, c0 ‚àà Abel, (c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2))

blocks.name: ngpsubcan
blocks.content: Cancel right subtraction inside a distance calculation. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Oct-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm ngpsubcan(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cngp), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))), wceq(co(co(c1, c5, c4), c6, co(c3, c5, c4)), co(c1, c6, c3)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(csg, c0))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cds, c0))
} = {
  eqtrd(co(co(c1, c5, c4), c6, co(c3, c5, c4)), co(c1, c6, c3), co(co(c1, cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(cfv(cminusg, c0), c4)), c6, co(c3, cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(cfv(cminusg, c0), c4))), wa(wcel(c0, cngp), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))))
  oveq12d(co(c1, c5, c4), c6, co(c3, c5, c4), co(c1, cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(cfv(cminusg, c0), c4)), co(c3, cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(cfv(cminusg, c0), c4)), wa(wcel(c0, cngp), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))))
  syl2anc(wa(wcel(c0, cngp), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))), wceq(co(c1, c5, c4), co(c1, cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(cfv(cminusg, c0), c4))), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c4, c2))
  grpsubval(c1, c2, c4, c5, cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(cminusg, c0), c0)
  syl2anc(wa(wcel(c0, cngp), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))), wceq(co(c3, c5, c4), co(c3, cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(cfv(cminusg, c0), c4))), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))
  grpsubval(c3, c2, c4, c5, cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(cminusg, c0), c0)
  syl13anc(wa(wcel(c0, cngp), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))), wceq(co(co(c1, cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(cfv(cminusg, c0), c4)), c6, co(c3, cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(cfv(cminusg, c0), c4))), co(c1, c6, c3)), wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c0), c4), c2))
  simpl(wcel(c0, cngp), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2)))
  simpr1(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))
  simpr2(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))
  syl2an2r(wcel(c0, cngp), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2)), wcel(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c0), c4), c2), wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c4, c2))
  ngpgrp(c0)
  simpr3(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))
  grpinvcl(c0, c4, c2, cfv(cminusg, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cminusg, c0))
  ngprcan(c0, c1, c2, c3, cfv(cfv(cminusg, c0), c4), cfv(cplusg, c0), c6)
  eqid(cfv(cplusg, c0))
}

  syl2anc((c0 ‚àà NrmGrp ‚àß(c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c2)), (c3[c5]c4)=(c3[(+ ` c0)]((invg ` c0)` c4)), c3 ‚àà c2, c4 ‚àà c2)
  grpsubval(c3, c2, c4, c5, (+ ` c0), (invg ` c0), c0)
  syl13anc((c0 ‚àà NrmGrp ‚àß(c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c2)), ((c1[(+ ` c0)]((invg ` c0)` c4))[c6](c3[(+ ` c0)]((invg ` c0)` c4)))=(c1[c6]c3), c0 ‚àà NrmGrp, c1 ‚àà c2, c3 ‚àà c2, ((invg ` c0)` c4)‚àà c2)
  simpl(c0 ‚àà NrmGrp, (c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c2))
  simpr1(c0 ‚àà NrmGrp, c1 ‚àà c2, c3 ‚àà c2, c4 ‚àà c2)
  simpr2(c0 ‚àà NrmGrp, c1 ‚àà c2, c3 ‚àà c2, c4 ‚àà c2)
  syl2an2r(c0 ‚àà NrmGrp, (c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c2), ((invg ` c0)` c4)‚àà c2, c0 ‚àà Grp, c4 ‚àà c2)
  ngpgrp(c0)
  simpr3(c0 ‚àà NrmGrp, c1 ‚àà c2, c3 ‚àà c2, c4 ‚àà c2)
  grpinvcl(c0, c4, c2, (invg ` c0))
  eqid((invg ` c0))
  ngprcan(c0, c1, c2, c3, ((invg ` c0)` c4), (+ ` c0), c6)
  eqid((+ ` c0))
}

blocks.name: nmf
blocks.content: The norm on a normed group is a function into the reals. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Oct-2015.)

blocks.name: nmcl
blocks.content: The norm of a normed group is closed in the reals. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Oct-2015.)

blocks.name: nmge0
blocks.content: The norm of a normed group is nonnegative. Second part of Problem 2 of [Kreyszig] p. 64. (Contributed by NM, 28-Nov-2006.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 4-Oct-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm nmge0(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c1, c2)), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(c3, c1)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cnm, c0))
} = {
  breqtrrd(nat0, cle, cfv(c3, c1), co(c1, cfv(cds, c0), cfv(c0g, c0)), wa(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c1, c2)))
  mpd3an3(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c1, c2), wbr(nat0, cle, co(c1, cfv(cds, c0), cfv(c0g, c0))), wcel(cfv(c0g, c0), c2))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cfv(c0g, c0), c2))
  syl(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(cfv(c0g, c0), c2), wcel(c0, cgrp))
  ngpgrp(c0)
  grpidcl(c0, cfv(c0g, c0), c2)
  syl3an1(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cfv(c0g, c0), c2), wbr(nat0, cle, co(c1, cfv(cds, c0), cfv(c0g, c0))), wcel(c0, cxms))
  ngpxms(c0)
  xmsge0(c0, c1, c2, cfv(c0g, c0), cfv(cds, c0))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c1, c2), wceq(cfv(c3, c1), co(c1, cfv(cds, c0), cfv(c0g, c0))))
  nmval(c1, c2, c3, cfv(cds, c0), cfv(c0g, c0), c0)
  eqid(cfv(c0g, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cds, c0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm nmge0(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà NrmGrp ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2)‚Üí 0[‚â§](c3 ` c1))
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(norm ` c0)
} = {
  breqtrrd(nat0, cle, (c3 ` c1), (c1[(dist ` c0)](0 ` c0)), (c0 ‚àà NrmGrp ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2))
  mpd3an3(c0 ‚àà NrmGrp, c1 ‚àà c2, 0[‚â§](c1[(dist ` c0)](0 ` c0)), (0 ` c0)‚àà c2)
  adantr(c0 ‚àà NrmGrp, c1 ‚àà c2, (0 ` c0)‚àà c2)
  syl(c0 ‚àà NrmGrp, (0 ` c0)‚àà c2, c0 ‚àà Grp)
  ngpgrp(c0)
  grpidcl(c0, (0 ` c0), c2)
  syl3an1(c0 ‚àà NrmGrp, c1 ‚àà c2, (0 ` c0)‚àà c2, 0[‚â§](c1[(dist ` c0)](0 ` c0)), c0 ‚àà *MetSp)
  ngpxms(c0)
  xmsge0(c0, c1, c2, (0 ` c0), (dist ` c0))
  adantl(c0 ‚àà NrmGrp, c1 ‚àà c2, (c3 ` c1)=(c1[(dist ` c0)](0 ` c0)))
  nmval(c1, c2, c3, (dist ` c0), (0 ` c0), c0)
  eqid((0 ` c0))
  eqid((dist ` c0))
}

blocks.name: nmeq0
blocks.content: The identity is the only element of the group with zero norm. First part of Problem 2 of [Kreyszig] p. 64. (Contributed by NM, 24-Nov-2006.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 4-Oct-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm nmeq0(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c1, c2)), wb(wceq(cfv(c3, c1), nat0), wceq(c1, c4)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cnm, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(c0g, c0))
} = {
  bitrd(wa(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(cfv(c3, c1), nat0), wceq(c1, c4), wceq(co(c1, cfv(cds, c0), c4), nat0))
  eqeq1d(cfv(c3, c1), nat0, co(c1, cfv(cds, c0), c4), wa(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c1, c2)))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c1, c2), wceq(cfv(c3, c1), co(c1, cfv(cds, c0), c4)))
  nmval(c1, c2, c3, cfv(cds, c0), c4, c0)
  mpd3an3(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c1, c2), wb(wceq(co(c1, cfv(cds, c0), c4), nat0), wceq(c1, c4)), wcel(c4, c2))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c0, cgrp))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c0, cgrp))
  ngpgrp(c0)
  grpidcl(c0, c4, c2)
  syl3an1(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c4, c2), wb(wceq(co(c1, cfv(cds, c0), c4), nat0), wceq(c1, c4)), wcel(c0, cxms))
  ngpxms(c0)
  xmseq0(c0, c1, c2, c4, cfv(cds, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cds, c0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm nmeq0(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà NrmGrp ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2)‚Üí((c3 ` c1)= 0 ‚Üî c1 = c4))
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(norm ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c4 =(0 ` c0)
} = {
  bitrd((c0 ‚àà NrmGrp ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2), (c3 ` c1)= 0, c1 = c4, (c1[(dist ` c0)]c4)= 0)
  eqeq1d((c3 ` c1), nat0, (c1[(dist ` c0)]c4), (c0 ‚àà NrmGrp ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2))
  adantl(c0 ‚àà NrmGrp, c1 ‚àà c2, (c3 ` c1)=(c1[(dist ` c0)]c4))
  nmval(c1, c2, c3, (dist ` c0), c4, c0)
  mpd3an3(c0 ‚àà NrmGrp, c1 ‚àà c2, ((c1[(dist ` c0)]c4)= 0 ‚Üî c1 = c4), c4 ‚àà c2)
  syl((c0 ‚àà NrmGrp ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2), c4 ‚àà c2, c0 ‚àà Grp)
  adantr(c0 ‚àà NrmGrp, c1 ‚àà c2, c0 ‚àà Grp)
  ngpgrp(c0)
  grpidcl(c0, c4, c2)
  syl3an1(c0 ‚àà NrmGrp, c1 ‚àà c2, c4 ‚àà c2, ((c1[(dist ` c0)]c4)= 0 ‚Üî c1 = c4), c0 ‚àà *MetSp)
  ngpxms(c0)
  xmseq0(c0, c1, c2, c4, (dist ` c0))

}

blocks.name: nmne0
blocks.content: The norm of a nonzero element is nonzero. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Oct-2015.)

blocks.name: nmrpcl
blocks.content: The norm of a nonzero element is a positive real. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Oct-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm nmrpcl(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c1, c2), wne(c1, c3)), wcel(cfv(c4, c1), crp))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cnm, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(c0g, c0))
} = {
  elrpd(cfv(c4, c1), w3a(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c1, c2), wne(c1, c3)))
  ne0gt0d(cfv(c4, c1), w3a(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c1, c2), wne(c1, c3)))
  3adant3(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c1, c2), wne(c1, c3), wcel(cfv(c4, c1), cr))
  nmcl(c0, c1, c2, c4)
  3adant3(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c1, c2), wne(c1, c3), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(c4, c1)))
  nmge0(c0, c1, c2, c4)
  nmne0(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm nmrpcl(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà NrmGrp ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c1 ‚â† c3)‚Üí(c4 ` c1)‚àà ‚Ñù+)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c4 =(norm ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(0 ` c0)
} = {
  elrpd((c4 ` c1), (c0 ‚àà NrmGrp ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c1 ‚â† c3))
  ne0gt0d((c4 ` c1), (c0 ‚àà NrmGrp ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c1 ‚â† c3))
  3adant3(c0 ‚àà NrmGrp, c1 ‚àà c2, c1 ‚â† c3, (c4 ` c1)‚àà ‚Ñù)
  nmcl(c0, c1, c2, c4)
  3adant3(c0 ‚àà NrmGrp, c1 ‚àà c2, c1 ‚â† c3, 0[‚â§](c4 ` c1))
  nmge0(c0, c1, c2, c4)
  nmne0(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4)
}

blocks.name: nminv
blocks.content: The norm of a negated element is the same as the norm of the original element. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Oct-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm nminv(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(cfv(c3, cfv(c4, c1)), cfv(c3, c1)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cnm, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cminusg, c0))
} = {
  3eqtr4rd(cfv(c3, cfv(c4, c1)), cfv(c3, c1), co(c1, cfv(cds, c0), cfv(c0g, c0)), cfv(c3, co(cfv(c0g, c0), cfv(csg, c0), c1)), wa(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c1, c2)))
  mpd3an3(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c1, c2), wceq(co(c1, cfv(cds, c0), cfv(c0g, c0)), cfv(c3, co(cfv(c0g, c0), cfv(csg, c0), c1))), wcel(cfv(c0g, c0), c2))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cfv(c0g, c0), c2), wcel(c0, cgrp))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c0, cgrp))
  grpidcl(c0, cfv(c0g, c0), c2)
  ngpdsr(c0, c1, c2, cfv(c0g, c0), cfv(cds, c0), c3, cfv(csg, c0))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c1, c2), wceq(cfv(c3, c1), co(c1, cfv(cds, c0), cfv(c0g, c0))))
  nmval(c1, c2, c3, cfv(cds, c0), cfv(c0g, c0), c0)
  eqid(cfv(cds, c0))
  fveq2d(c3, cfv(c4, c1), co(cfv(c0g, c0), cfv(csg, c0), c1), wa(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c1, c2)))
  sylan(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c1, c2), wceq(cfv(c4, c1), co(cfv(c0g, c0), cfv(csg, c0), c1)), wcel(c0, cgrp))
  ngpgrp(c0)
  grpinvval2(c0, c1, c2, c4, cfv(c0g, c0), cfv(csg, c0))
  eqid(cfv(csg, c0))
  eqid(cfv(c0g, c0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm nminv(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà NrmGrp ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2)‚Üí(c3 `(c4 ` c1))=(c3 ` c1))
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(norm ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c4 =(invg ` c0)
} = {
  3eqtr4rd((c3 `(c4 ` c1)), (c3 ` c1), (c1[(dist ` c0)](0 ` c0)), (c3 `((0 ` c0)[(-g ` c0)]c1)), (c0 ‚àà NrmGrp ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2))
  mpd3an3(c0 ‚àà NrmGrp, c1 ‚àà c2, (c1[(dist ` c0)](0 ` c0))=(c3 `((0 ` c0)[(-g ` c0)]c1)), (0 ` c0)‚àà c2)
  syl((c0 ‚àà NrmGrp ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2), (0 ` c0)‚àà c2, c0 ‚àà Grp)
  adantr(c0 ‚àà NrmGrp, c1 ‚àà c2, c0 ‚àà Grp)
  grpidcl(c0, (0 ` c0), c2)
  ngpdsr(c0, c1, c2, (0 ` c0), (dist ` c0), c3, (-g ` c0))
  adantl(c0 ‚àà NrmGrp, c1 ‚àà c2, (c3 ` c1)=(c1[(dist ` c0)](0 ` c0)))
  nmval(c1, c2, c3, (dist ` c0), (0 ` c0), c0)
  eqid((dist ` c0))
  fveq2d(c3, (c4 ` c1), ((0 ` c0)[(-g ` c0)]c1), (c0 ‚àà NrmGrp ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2))
  sylan(c0 ‚àà NrmGrp, c1 ‚àà c2, (c4 ` c1)=((0 ` c0)[(-g ` c0)]c1), c0 ‚àà Grp)

  grpinvval2(c0, c1, c2, c4, (0 ` c0), (-g ` c0))
  eqid((-g ` c0))
  eqid((0 ` c0))
}

blocks.name: nmmtri
blocks.content: The triangle inequality for the norm of a subtraction. (Contributed by NM, 27-Dec-2007.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 4-Oct-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm nmmtri(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wbr(cfv(c4, co(c1, c5, c3)), cle, co(cfv(c4, c1), caddc, cfv(c4, c3))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cnm, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(csg, c0))
} = {
  eqbrtrrd(cfv(c4, co(c1, c5, c3)), cle, co(cfv(c4, c1), caddc, cfv(c4, c3)), co(c1, cfv(cds, c0), c3), w3a(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)))
  ngpds(c0, c1, c2, c3, cfv(cds, c0), c4, c5)
  breqtrrd(co(c1, cfv(cds, c0), c3), cle, co(cfv(c4, c1), caddc, cfv(c4, c3)), co(co(c1, cfv(cds, c0), cfv(c0g, c0)), caddc, co(c3, cfv(cds, c0), cfv(c0g, c0))), w3a(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)))
  syl13anc(w3a(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wbr(co(c1, cfv(cds, c0), c3), cle, co(co(c1, cfv(cds, c0), cfv(c0g, c0)), caddc, co(c3, cfv(cds, c0), cfv(c0g, c0)))), wcel(c0, cms), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(cfv(c0g, c0), c2))
  3ad2ant1(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c0, cms))
  ngpms(c0)
  simp2(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2))
  simp3(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2))
  3ad2ant1(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(cfv(c0g, c0), c2))
  syl(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(cfv(c0g, c0), c2), wcel(c0, cgrp))
  ngpgrp(c0)
  grpidcl(c0, cfv(c0g, c0), c2)
  mstri3(c0, c1, c2, c3, cfv(c0g, c0), cfv(cds, c0))
  oveq12d(cfv(c4, c1), caddc, cfv(c4, c3), co(c1, cfv(cds, c0), cfv(c0g, c0)), co(c3, cfv(cds, c0), cfv(c0g, c0)), w3a(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)))
  3ad2ant2(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wceq(cfv(c4, c1), co(c1, cfv(cds, c0), cfv(c0g, c0))))
  nmval(c1, c2, c4, cfv(cds, c0), cfv(c0g, c0), c0)
  3ad2ant3(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wceq(cfv(c4, c3), co(c3, cfv(cds, c0), cfv(c0g, c0))))
  nmval(c3, c2, c4, cfv(cds, c0), cfv(c0g, c0), c0)
  eqid(cfv(c0g, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cds, c0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm nmmtri(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà NrmGrp ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2)‚Üí(c4 `(c1[c5]c3))[‚â§]((c4 ` c1)[+](c4 ` c3)))
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Base ` c0)

  ‚ä£ c5 =(-g ` c0)
} = {
  eqbrtrrd((c4 `(c1[c5]c3)), cle, ((c4 ` c1)[+](c4 ` c3)), (c1[(dist ` c0)]c3), (c0 ‚àà NrmGrp ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2))
  ngpds(c0, c1, c2, c3, (dist ` c0), c4, c5)
  breqtrrd((c1[(dist ` c0)]c3), cle, ((c4 ` c1)[+](c4 ` c3)), ((c1[(dist ` c0)](0 ` c0))[+](c3[(dist ` c0)](0 ` c0))), (c0 ‚àà NrmGrp ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2))
  syl13anc((c0 ‚àà NrmGrp ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2), (c1[(dist ` c0)]c3)[‚â§]((c1[(dist ` c0)](0 ` c0))[+](c3[(dist ` c0)](0 ` c0))), c0 ‚àà MetSp, c1 ‚àà c2, c3 ‚àà c2, (0 ` c0)‚àà c2)
  3ad2ant1(c0 ‚àà NrmGrp, c1 ‚àà c2, c3 ‚àà c2, c0 ‚àà MetSp)
  ngpms(c0)
  simp2(c0 ‚àà NrmGrp, c1 ‚àà c2, c3 ‚àà c2)
  simp3(c0 ‚àà NrmGrp, c1 ‚àà c2, c3 ‚àà c2)
  3ad2ant1(c0 ‚àà NrmGrp, c1 ‚àà c2, c3 ‚àà c2, (0 ` c0)‚àà c2)
  syl(c0 ‚àà NrmGrp, (0 ` c0)‚àà c2, c0 ‚àà Grp)
  ngpgrp(c0)
  grpidcl(c0, (0 ` c0), c2)
  mstri3(c0, c1, c2, c3, (0 ` c0), (dist ` c0))
  oveq12d((c4 ` c1), caddc, (c4 ` c3), (c1[(dist ` c0)](0 ` c0)), (c3[(dist ` c0)](0 ` c0)), (c0 ‚àà NrmGrp ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2))
  3ad2ant2(c0 ‚àà NrmGrp, c1 ‚àà c2, c3 ‚àà c2, (c4 ` c1)=(c1[(dist ` c0)](0 ` c0)))
  nmval(c1, c2, c4, (dist ` c0), (0 ` c0), c0)
  3ad2ant3(c0 ‚àà NrmGrp, c1 ‚àà c2, c3 ‚àà c2, (c4 ` c3)=(c3[(dist ` c0)](0 ` c0)))
  nmval(c3, c2, c4, (dist ` c0), (0 ` c0), c0)
  eqid((0 ` c0))
  eqid((dist ` c0))
}

thm nmsub(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wceq(cfv(c4, co(c1, c5, c3)), cfv(c4, co(c3, c5, c1))))

  syl3anc(w3a(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wceq(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c0), co(c3, c5, c1)), co(c1, c5, c3)), wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c1, c2))
  grpinvsub(c0, c3, c2, c1, cfv(cminusg, c0), c5)

  syl3anc(w3a(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wcel(co(c3, c5, c1), c2), wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c1, c2))
  syl(w3a(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c0, cngp))

blocks.content: Reverse triangle inequality for the norm of a subtraction. Problem 3 of [Kreyszig] p. 64. (Contributed by NM, 4-Dec-2006.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 4-Oct-2015.)

thm nmrtri(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c4, c1), cmin, cfv(c4, c3))), cle, cfv(c4, co(c1, c5, c3))))

  -| wceq(c5, cfv(csg, c0))
} = {
  3brtr4d(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c4, c1), cmin, cfv(c4, c3))), cle, cfv(c4, co(c1, c5, c3)), cfv(cabs, co(co(c1, cfv(cds, c0), cfv(c0g, c0)), cmin, co(c3, cfv(cds, c0), cfv(c0g, c0)))), co(c1, cfv(cds, c0), c3), w3a(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)))
  syl13anc(w3a(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(co(c1, cfv(cds, c0), cfv(c0g, c0)), cmin, co(c3, cfv(cds, c0), cfv(c0g, c0)))), cle, co(c1, cfv(cds, c0), c3)), wcel(c0, cms), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(cfv(c0g, c0), c2))
  3ad2ant1(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c0, cms))
  ngpms(c0)
  simp2(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2))
  simp3(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2))
  syl(w3a(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wcel(cfv(c0g, c0), c2), wcel(c0, cgrp))
  3ad2ant1(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c0, cgrp))

  grpidcl(c0, cfv(c0g, c0), c2)
  msrtri(c0, c1, c2, c3, cfv(c0g, c0), cfv(cds, c0))
  fveq2d(cabs, co(cfv(c4, c1), cmin, cfv(c4, c3)), co(co(c1, cfv(cds, c0), cfv(c0g, c0)), cmin, co(c3, cfv(cds, c0), cfv(c0g, c0))), w3a(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)))
  oveq12d(cfv(c4, c1), cmin, cfv(c4, c3), co(c1, cfv(cds, c0), cfv(c0g, c0)), co(c3, cfv(cds, c0), cfv(c0g, c0)), w3a(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)))
  3ad2ant2(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wceq(cfv(c4, c1), co(c1, cfv(cds, c0), cfv(c0g, c0))))
  nmval(c1, c2, c4, cfv(cds, c0), cfv(c0g, c0), c0)
  3ad2ant3(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wceq(cfv(c4, c3), co(c3, cfv(cds, c0), cfv(c0g, c0))))
  nmval(c3, c2, c4, cfv(cds, c0), cfv(c0g, c0), c0)
  eqid(cfv(c0g, c0))
  eqcomd(cfv(c4, co(c1, c5, c3)), co(c1, cfv(cds, c0), c3), w3a(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)))

  oveq12d((c4 ` c1), cmin, (c4 ` c3), (c1[(dist ` c0)](0 ` c0)), (c3[(dist ` c0)](0 ` c0)), (c0 ‚àà NrmGrp ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2))

thm nm2dif(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {

} = {
  letrd(co(cfv(c4, c1), cmin, cfv(c4, c3)), cfv(c4, co(c1, c5, c3)), cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c4, c1), cmin, cfv(c4, c3))), w3a(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)))
  abscld(co(cfv(c4, c1), cmin, cfv(c4, c3)), w3a(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)))
  recnd(co(cfv(c4, c1), cmin, cfv(c4, c3)), w3a(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)))
  syl2anc(w3a(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wcel(cfv(c4, co(c1, c5, c3)), cr), wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(co(c1, c5, c3), c2))
  simp1(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2))

thm nmtri(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {

  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cnm, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cplusg, c0))
} = {
  3brtr3d(cfv(c4, co(c1, c5, c3)), cle, co(cfv(c4, c1), caddc, cfv(c4, c3)), cfv(c4, co(c1, cfv(csg, c0), cfv(cfv(cminusg, c0), c3))), co(cfv(c4, c1), caddc, cfv(c4, cfv(cfv(cminusg, c0), c3))), w3a(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)))

  syl2anc(w3a(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wcel(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c0), c3), c2), wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c3, c2))
  grpinvcl(c0, c3, c2, cfv(cminusg, c0))
  nmmtri(c0, c1, c2, cfv(cfv(cminusg, c0), c3), c4, cfv(csg, c0))
  fveq2d(c4, co(c1, cfv(csg, c0), cfv(cfv(cminusg, c0), c3)), co(c1, c5, c3), w3a(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)))
  grpsubinv(c1, cfv(csg, c0), cfv(cminusg, c0), c3, c5, c2, c0, w3a(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)))
  eqid(cfv(csg, c0))
  3ad2ant1(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c0, cgrp))
  ngpgrp(c0)
  simp2(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2))

  3adant2(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wceq(cfv(c4, cfv(cfv(cminusg, c0), c3)), cfv(c4, c3)))

  ‚ä£ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c4 =(norm ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c5 =(+ ` c0)
} = {
  3brtr3d((c4 `(c1[c5]c3)), cle, ((c4 ` c1)[+](c4 ` c3)), (c4 `(c1[(-g ` c0)]((invg ` c0)` c3))), ((c4 ` c1)[+](c4 `((invg ` c0)` c3))), (c0 ‚àà NrmGrp ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2))
  syld3an3(c0 ‚àà NrmGrp, c1 ‚àà c2, c3 ‚àà c2, (c4 `(c1[(-g ` c0)]((invg ` c0)` c3)))[‚â§]((c4 ` c1)[+](c4 `((invg ` c0)` c3))), ((invg ` c0)` c3)‚àà c2)
  syl2anc((c0 ‚àà NrmGrp ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2), ((invg ` c0)` c3)‚àà c2, c0 ‚àà Grp, c3 ‚àà c2)
  grpinvcl(c0, c3, c2, (invg ` c0))
  nmmtri(c0, c1, c2, ((invg ` c0)` c3), c4, (-g ` c0))
  fveq2d(c4, (c1[(-g ` c0)]((invg ` c0)` c3)), (c1[c5]c3), (c0 ‚àà NrmGrp ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2))
  grpsubinv(c1, (-g ` c0), (invg ` c0), c3, c5, c2, c0, (c0 ‚àà NrmGrp ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2))
  eqid((-g ` c0))
  3ad2ant1(c0 ‚àà NrmGrp, c1 ‚àà c2, c3 ‚àà c2, c0 ‚àà Grp)
  ngpgrp(c0)
  simp2(c0 ‚àà NrmGrp, c1 ‚àà c2, c3 ‚àà c2)
  simp3(c0 ‚àà NrmGrp, c1 ‚àà c2, c3 ‚àà c2)
  oveq2d((c4 ` c1), caddc, (c4 `((invg ` c0)` c3)), (c4 ` c3), (c0 ‚àà NrmGrp ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2))
  3adant2(c0 ‚àà NrmGrp, c1 ‚àà c2, c3 ‚àà c2, (c4 `((invg ` c0)` c3))=(c4 ` c3))
  nminv(c0, c3, c2, c4, (invg ` c0))
  eqid((invg ` c0))
}

blocks.name: nmtri2
blocks.content: Triangle inequality for the norm of two subtractions. (Contributed by NM, 24-Feb-2008.) (Revised by AV, 8-Oct-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm nmtri2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cngp), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))), wbr(cfv(c5, co(c1, c6, c4)), cle, co(cfv(c5, co(c1, c6, c3)), caddc, cfv(c5, co(c3, c6, c4)))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cnm, c0))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(csg, c0))
} = {
  eqbrtrd(cfv(c5, co(c1, c6, c4)), cle, co(cfv(c5, co(c1, c6, c3)), caddc, cfv(c5, co(c3, c6, c4))), cfv(c5, co(co(c1, c6, c3), cfv(cplusg, c0), co(c3, c6, c4))), wa(wcel(c0, cngp), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))))
  fveq2d(c5, co(c1, c6, c4), co(co(c1, c6, c3), cfv(cplusg, c0), co(c3, c6, c4)), wa(wcel(c0, cngp), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))))
  sylan(wcel(c0, cngp), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2)), wceq(co(c1, c6, c4), co(co(c1, c6, c3), cfv(cplusg, c0), co(c3, c6, c4))), wcel(c0, cgrp))
  eqcomd(co(c1, c6, c4), co(co(c1, c6, c3), cfv(cplusg, c0), co(c3, c6, c4)), wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))))
  grpnpncan(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c6, cfv(cplusg, c0))
  syl3anc(wa(wcel(c0, cngp), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))), wbr(cfv(c5, co(co(c1, c6, c3), cfv(cplusg, c0), co(c3, c6, c4))), cle, co(cfv(c5, co(c1, c6, c3)), caddc, cfv(c5, co(c3, c6, c4)))), wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(co(c1, c6, c3), c2), wcel(co(c3, c6, c4), c2))
  simpl(wcel(c0, cngp), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2)))
  syl3anc(wa(wcel(c0, cngp), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))), wcel(co(c1, c6, c3), c2), wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2))
  simpr1(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))
  grpsubcl(c0, c1, c2, c3, c6)
  syl3anc(wa(wcel(c0, cngp), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))), wcel(co(c3, c6, c4), c2), wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cngp), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2)), wcel(c0, cgrp))
  ngpgrp(c0)
  simpr2(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))
  simpr3(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))
  grpsubcl(c0, c3, c2, c4, c6)
  nmtri(c0, co(c1, c6, c3), c2, co(c3, c6, c4), c5, cfv(cplusg, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cplusg, c0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm nmtri2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà NrmGrp ‚àß(c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c2))‚Üí(c5 `(c1[c6]c4))[‚â§]((c5 `(c1[c6]c3))[+](c5 `(c3[c6]c4))))
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c5 =(norm ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c6 =(-g ` c0)
} = {
  eqbrtrd((c5 `(c1[c6]c4)), cle, ((c5 `(c1[c6]c3))[+](c5 `(c3[c6]c4))), (c5 `((c1[c6]c3)[(+ ` c0)](c3[c6]c4))), (c0 ‚àà NrmGrp ‚àß(c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c2)))
  fveq2d(c5, (c1[c6]c4), ((c1[c6]c3)[(+ ` c0)](c3[c6]c4)), (c0 ‚àà NrmGrp ‚àß(c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c2)))
  sylan(c0 ‚àà NrmGrp, (c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c2), (c1[c6]c4)=((c1[c6]c3)[(+ ` c0)](c3[c6]c4)), c0 ‚àà Grp)
  eqcomd((c1[c6]c4), ((c1[c6]c3)[(+ ` c0)](c3[c6]c4)), (c0 ‚àà Grp ‚àß(c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c2)))
  grpnpncan(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c6, (+ ` c0))
  syl3anc((c0 ‚àà NrmGrp ‚àß(c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c2)), (c5 `((c1[c6]c3)[(+ ` c0)](c3[c6]c4)))[‚â§]((c5 `(c1[c6]c3))[+](c5 `(c3[c6]c4))), c0 ‚àà NrmGrp, (c1[c6]c3)‚àà c2, (c3[c6]c4)‚àà c2)
  simpl(c0 ‚àà NrmGrp, (c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c2))
  syl3anc((c0 ‚àà NrmGrp ‚àß(c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c2)), (c1[c6]c3)‚àà c2, c0 ‚àà Grp, c1 ‚àà c2, c3 ‚àà c2)
  simpr1(c0 ‚àà NrmGrp, c1 ‚àà c2, c3 ‚àà c2, c4 ‚àà c2)
  grpsubcl(c0, c1, c2, c3, c6)
  syl3anc((c0 ‚àà NrmGrp ‚àß(c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c2)), (c3[c6]c4)‚àà c2, c0 ‚àà Grp, c3 ‚àà c2, c4 ‚àà c2)
  adantr(c0 ‚àà NrmGrp, (c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c2), c0 ‚àà Grp)
  ngpgrp(c0)
  simpr2(c0 ‚àà NrmGrp, c1 ‚àà c2, c3 ‚àà c2, c4 ‚àà c2)
  simpr3(c0 ‚àà NrmGrp, c1 ‚àà c2, c3 ‚àà c2, c4 ‚àà c2)
  grpsubcl(c0, c3, c2, c4, c6)
  nmtri(c0, (c1[c6]c3), c2, (c3[c6]c4), c5, (+ ` c0))
  eqid((+ ` c0))
}

blocks.name: ngpi
blocks.content: The properties of a normed group, which is a group accompanied by a norm. (Contributed by AV, 7-Oct-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm ngpi(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cngp), w3a(wcel(c0, cgrp), wf(c1, c2, cr), wral(s0, c2, wa(wb(wceq(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), nat0), wceq(cv(s0), c3)), wral(s1, c2, wbr(cfv(c1, co(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1))), cle, co(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), caddc, cfv(c1, cv(s1)))))))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cnm, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(csg, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(c0g, c0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  3jca(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c0, cgrp), wf(c1, c2, cr), wral(s0, c2, wa(wb(wceq(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), nat0), wceq(cv(s0), c3)), wral(s1, c2, wbr(cfv(c1, co(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1))), cle, co(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), caddc, cfv(c1, cv(s1))))))))
  ngpgrp(c0)
  nmf(c0, c1, c2)
  ralrimiva(s0, c2, wcel(c0, cngp), wa(wb(wceq(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), nat0), wceq(cv(s0), c3)), wral(s1, c2, wbr(cfv(c1, co(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1))), cle, co(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), caddc, cfv(c1, cv(s1)))))))
  jca(wa(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wb(wceq(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), nat0), wceq(cv(s0), c3)), wral(s1, c2, wbr(cfv(c1, co(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1))), cle, co(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), caddc, cfv(c1, cv(s1))))))
  nmeq0(c0, cv(s0), c2, c1, c3)
  ralrimiva(s1, c2, wa(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wbr(cfv(c1, co(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1))), cle, co(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), caddc, cfv(c1, cv(s1)))))
  3expa(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s1), c2), wbr(cfv(c1, co(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1))), cle, co(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), caddc, cfv(c1, cv(s1)))))
  nmmtri(c0, cv(s0), c2, cv(s1), c1, c4)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, cngp)
  diff.cngp.s(s0)
  diff.wa.s(s1, wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(cv(s0), c2))
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c0, cngp)
  diff.cngp.s(s1)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(s0), c2)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ngpi(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà NrmGrp ‚Üí(c0 ‚àà Grp ‚àß(c1 : c2 ‚Üí ‚Ñù)‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c2,(((c1 ` s0)= 0 ‚Üî s0 = c3)‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c2,(c1 `(s0[c4]s1))[‚â§]((c1 ` s0)[+](c1 ` s1)))))))
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(norm ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c4 =(-g ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(0 ` c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
} = {
  3jca(c0 ‚àà NrmGrp, c0 ‚àà Grp, (c1 : c2 ‚Üí ‚Ñù), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c2,(((c1 ` s0)= 0 ‚Üî s0 = c3)‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c2,(c1 `(s0[c4]s1))[‚â§]((c1 ` s0)[+](c1 ` s1))))))
  ngpgrp(c0)
  nmf(c0, c1, c2)
  ralrimiva(s0, c2, c0 ‚àà NrmGrp, (((c1 ` s0)= 0 ‚Üî s0 = c3)‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c2,(c1 `(s0[c4]s1))[‚â§]((c1 ` s0)[+](c1 ` s1)))))
  jca((c0 ‚àà NrmGrp ‚àß s0 ‚àà c2), ((c1 ` s0)= 0 ‚Üî s0 = c3), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c2,(c1 `(s0[c4]s1))[‚â§]((c1 ` s0)[+](c1 ` s1))))
  nmeq0(c0, s0, c2, c1, c3)
  ralrimiva(s1, c2, (c0 ‚àà NrmGrp ‚àß s0 ‚àà c2), (c1 `(s0[c4]s1))[‚â§]((c1 ` s0)[+](c1 ` s1)))
  3expa(c0 ‚àà NrmGrp, s0 ‚àà c2, s1 ‚àà c2, (c1 `(s0[c4]s1))[‚â§]((c1 ` s0)[+](c1 ` s1)))
  nmmtri(c0, s0, c2, s1, c1, c4)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, cngp)
  diff.cngp.s(s0)
  diff.wa.s(s1, c0 ‚àà NrmGrp, s0 ‚àà c2)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c0, cngp)
  diff.cngp.s(s1)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, s0, c2)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

blocks.name: nm0
blocks.content: Norm of the identity element. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Oct-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm nm0(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cngp), wceq(cfv(c1, c2), nat0))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cnm, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(c0g, c0))
} = {
  mpbiri(wcel(c0, cngp), wceq(cfv(c1, c2), nat0), wceq(c2, c2))
  eqid(c2)
  mpdan(wcel(c0, cngp), wb(wceq(cfv(c1, c2), nat0), wceq(c2, c2)), wcel(c2, cfv(cbs, c0)))
  syl(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c2, cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(c0, cgrp))
  ngpgrp(c0)
  grpidcl(c0, c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  nmeq0(c0, c2, cfv(cbs, c0), c1, c2)
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm nm0(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà NrmGrp ‚Üí(c1 ` c2)= 0)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(norm ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(0 ` c0)
} = {
  mpbiri(c0 ‚àà NrmGrp, (c1 ` c2)= 0, c2 = c2)
  eqid(c2)
  mpdan(c0 ‚àà NrmGrp, ((c1 ` c2)= 0 ‚Üî c2 = c2), c2 ‚àà(Base ` c0))
  syl(c0 ‚àà NrmGrp, c2 ‚àà(Base ` c0), c0 ‚àà Grp)
  ngpgrp(c0)
  grpidcl(c0, c2, (Base ` c0))
  nmeq0(c0, c2, (Base ` c0), c1, c2)
  eqid((Base ` c0))
}

blocks.name: nmgt0
blocks.content: The norm of a nonzero element is a positive real. (Contributed by NM, 20-Nov-2007.) (Revised by AV, 8-Oct-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm nmgt0(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c1, c2)), wb(wne(c1, c3), wbr(nat0, clt, cfv(c4, c1))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cnm, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(c0g, c0))
} = {
  bitr3d(wa(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c1, c2)), wne(c1, c3), wbr(nat0, clt, cfv(c4, c1)), wne(cfv(c4, c1), nat0))
  necon3bid(cfv(c4, c1), nat0, c1, c3, wa(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c1, c2)))
  nmeq0(c0, c1, c2, c4, c3)
  syl2anc(wa(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c1, c2)), wb(wne(cfv(c4, c1), nat0), wbr(nat0, clt, cfv(c4, c1))), wcel(cfv(c4, c1), cr), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(c4, c1)))
  nmcl(c0, c1, c2, c4)
  nmge0(c0, c1, c2, c4)
  ne0gt0(cfv(c4, c1))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm nmgt0(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà NrmGrp ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2)‚Üí(c1 ‚â† c3 ‚Üî 0[<](c4 ` c1)))
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c4 =(norm ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(0 ` c0)
} = {
  bitr3d((c0 ‚àà NrmGrp ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2), c1 ‚â† c3, 0[<](c4 ` c1), (c4 ` c1)‚â† 0)
  necon3bid((c4 ` c1), nat0, c1, c3, (c0 ‚àà NrmGrp ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2))
  nmeq0(c0, c1, c2, c4, c3)
  syl2anc((c0 ‚àà NrmGrp ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2), ((c4 ` c1)‚â† 0 ‚Üî 0[<](c4 ` c1)), (c4 ` c1)‚àà ‚Ñù, 0[‚â§](c4 ` c1))
  nmcl(c0, c1, c2, c4)
  nmge0(c0, c1, c2, c4)
  ne0gt0((c4 ` c1))
}

blocks.name: sgrim
blocks.content: The induced metric on a subgroup is the induced metric on the parent group equipped with a norm. (Contributed by NM, 1-Feb-2008.) (Revised by AV, 19-Oct-2021.)

blocks.name: sgrimval
blocks.content: The induced metric on a subgroup in terms of the induced metric on the parent normed group. (Contributed by NM, 1-Feb-2008.) (Revised by AV, 19-Oct-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm sgrimval(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, class c9) {
  |- wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c1, c2)), wa(wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c4, c1))), wceq(co(c3, c5, c4), co(c3, c6, c4)))
  -| wceq(c7, co(c8, cress, c1))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cds, c8))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cds, c7))
  -| wceq(c8, co(c0, ctng, c9))
  -| wceq(c9, cfv(cnm, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(csubg, c8))
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c1, c2)), wa(wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c4, c1))), wceq(co(c3, c5, c4), co(c3, c6, c4))), wceq(c8, co(c0, ctng, c9)))
  a1ii(wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c1, c2)), wa(wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c4, c1))), wceq(co(c3, c5, c4), co(c3, c6, c4))), wceq(c9, cfv(cnm, c0)))
  a1ii(wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c1, c2)), wa(wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c4, c1))), wceq(co(c3, c5, c4), co(c3, c6, c4))), wceq(c2, cfv(csubg, c8)))
  ad2antlr(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c1, c2), wa(wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c4, c1)), wceq(co(c3, c5, c4), co(c3, c6, c4)))

thm sgrimval(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, class c9) {

  ‚ä£ c7 =(c8[|`s]c1)
  ‚ä£ c6 =(dist ` c8)
  ‚ä£ c5 =(dist ` c7)
  ‚ä£ c8 =(c0[toNrmGrp]c9)
  ‚ä£ c9 =(norm ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(SubGrp ` c8)
} = {
  a1ii((((c0 ‚àà NrmGrp ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2)‚àß(c3 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c1))‚Üí(c3[c5]c4)=(c3[c6]c4)), c8 =(c0[toNrmGrp]c9))

  a1ii((((c0 ‚àà NrmGrp ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2)‚àß(c3 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c1))‚Üí(c3[c5]c4)=(c3[c6]c4)), c2 =(SubGrp ` c8))
  ad2antlr(c0 ‚àà NrmGrp, c1 ‚àà c2, (c3 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c1), (c3[c5]c4)=(c3[c6]c4))

thm subgnm(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(csubg, c1)), wceq(c2, cres(c3, c0)))
  -| wceq(c4, co(c1, cress, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cnm, c1))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cnm, c4))
} = {
  3eqtr4g(c2, cres(c3, c0), cmpt(hs0, cfv(cbs, c4), co(cv(hs0), cfv(cds, c4), cfv(c0g, c4))), cres(cmpt(hs0, cfv(cbs, c1), co(cv(hs0), cfv(cds, c1), cfv(c0g, c1))), c0), wcel(c0, cfv(csubg, c1)))
  eqtr2d(cmpt(hs0, cfv(cbs, c4), co(cv(hs0), cfv(cds, c4), cfv(c0g, c4))), cres(cmpt(hs0, cfv(cbs, c1), co(cv(hs0), cfv(cds, c1), cfv(c0g, c1))), c0), cmpt(hs0, c0, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cds, c1), cfv(c0g, c1))), wcel(c0, cfv(csubg, c1)))
  resmptd(hs0, cfv(cbs, c1), co(cv(hs0), cfv(cds, c1), cfv(c0g, c1)), c0, wcel(c0, cfv(csubg, c1)))
  subgss(c0, c1, cfv(cbs, c1))
  mpteq12dv(hs0, c0, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cds, c1), cfv(c0g, c1)), cfv(cbs, c4), co(cv(hs0), cfv(cds, c4), cfv(c0g, c4)), wcel(c0, cfv(csubg, c1)))
  subgbas(c0, c1, c4)
  oveq123d(cv(hs0), cfv(cds, c1), cfv(c0g, c1), cv(hs0), cfv(cds, c4), cfv(c0g, c4), wcel(c0, cfv(csubg, c1)))
  ressds(c0, cfv(csubg, c1), cfv(cds, c1), c4, c1)
  eqidd(cv(hs0), wcel(c0, cfv(csubg, c1)))
  subg0(c0, c1, cfv(c0g, c1), c4)
  nmfval(hs0, c2, cfv(cbs, c4), cfv(cds, c4), cfv(c0g, c4), c4)
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c4))
  eqid(cfv(c0g, c4))
  eqid(cfv(cds, c4))
  reseq1i(c3, c0, cmpt(hs0, cfv(cbs, c1), co(cv(hs0), cfv(cds, c1), cfv(c0g, c1))))
  nmfval(hs0, c3, cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cds, c1), cfv(c0g, c1), c1)
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c1))
  eqid(cfv(c0g, c1))
  eqid(cfv(cds, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cbs, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, cfv(csubg, c1)))
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cbs, c4))
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cds, c4))
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(c0g, c4))
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cds, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(c0g, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
}

thm subgnm(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c1)‚Üí c2 =(c3 |` c0))
  ‚ä£ c4 =(c1[|`s]c0)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(norm ` c1)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(norm ` c4)
} = {
  3eqtr4g(c2, (c3 |` c0), (hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c4)‚Ü¶(hs0[(dist ` c4)](0 ` c4))), ((hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c1)‚Ü¶(hs0[(dist ` c1)](0 ` c1)))|` c0), c0 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c1))
  eqtr2d((hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c4)‚Ü¶(hs0[(dist ` c4)](0 ` c4))), ((hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c1)‚Ü¶(hs0[(dist ` c1)](0 ` c1)))|` c0), (hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶(hs0[(dist ` c1)](0 ` c1))), c0 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c1))
  resmptd(hs0, (Base ` c1), (hs0[(dist ` c1)](0 ` c1)), c0, c0 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c1))
  subgss(c0, c1, (Base ` c1))
  mpteq12dv(hs0, c0, (hs0[(dist ` c1)](0 ` c1)), (Base ` c4), (hs0[(dist ` c4)](0 ` c4)), c0 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c1))
  subgbas(c0, c1, c4)
  oveq123d(hs0, (dist ` c1), (0 ` c1), hs0, (dist ` c4), (0 ` c4), c0 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c1))
  ressds(c0, (SubGrp ` c1), (dist ` c1), c4, c1)
  eqidd(hs0, c0 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c1))
  subg0(c0, c1, (0 ` c1), c4)
  nmfval(hs0, c2, (Base ` c4), (dist ` c4), (0 ` c4), c4)
  eqid((Base ` c4))
  eqid((0 ` c4))
  eqid((dist ` c4))
  reseq1i(c3, c0, (hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c1)‚Ü¶(hs0[(dist ` c1)](0 ` c1))))
  nmfval(hs0, c3, (Base ` c1), (dist ` c1), (0 ` c1), c1)
  eqid((Base ` c1))
  eqid((0 ` c1))
  eqid((dist ` c1))
  diff.hs0.c((Base ` c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(c0 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c1))

}

  eqtr3d(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cds, c2), cv(hs1)), cfv(cfv(cnm, c0), co(cv(hs0), cfv(csg, c0), cv(hs1))), co(cv(hs0), cfv(cds, c0), cv(hs1)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c1, cfv(csubg, c0))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c2)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c2)))))

  ad2antlr(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c1, cfv(csubg, c0)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c2)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c2))), wceq(cfv(cds, c0), cfv(cds, c2)))
  ressds(c1, cfv(csubg, c0), cfv(cds, c0), c2, c0)

  sseldd(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c0), c1, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c1, cfv(csubg, c0))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c2)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c2)))))
  ad2antlr(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c1, cfv(csubg, c0)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c2)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c2))), wss(c1, cfv(cbs, c0)))

  simprr(wa(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c1, cfv(csubg, c0))), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c2)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c2)))
  ngpds(c0, cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c0), cv(hs1), cfv(cds, c0), cfv(cnm, c0), cfv(csg, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c0))

  eqid(cfv(cds, c0))

  simplr(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c1, cfv(csubg, c0)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c2)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c2))))
  eleqtrrd(co(cv(hs0), cfv(csg, c2), cv(hs1)), c1, cfv(cbs, c2), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c1, cfv(csubg, c0))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c2)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c2)))))
  sylan(wa(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c1, cfv(csubg, c0))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c2)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c2))), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cfv(csg, c2), cv(hs1)), cfv(cbs, c2)), wcel(c2, cgrp))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c1, cfv(csubg, c0)), wcel(c2, cgrp))
  subggrp(c1, c0, c2)
  3expb(wcel(c2, cgrp), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c2)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c2)), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cfv(csg, c2), cv(hs1)), cfv(cbs, c2)))
  grpsubcl(c2, cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c2), cv(hs1), cfv(csg, c2))
  ad2antlr(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c1, cfv(csubg, c0)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c2)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c2))), wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c2)))

thm subgngp(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà NrmGrp ‚àß c1 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c0))‚Üí c2 ‚àà NrmGrp)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(c0[|`s]c1)
} = {
  syl3anbrc((c0 ‚àà NrmGrp ‚àß c1 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c0)), c2 ‚àà NrmGrp, c2 ‚àà Grp, c2 ‚àà MetSp, ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c2), ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà(Base ` c2),(hs0[(dist ` c2)]hs1)=((norm ` c2)`(hs0[(-g ` c2)]hs1)))))
  syl5eqel(c2, cms, (c0[|`s]c1), (c0 ‚àà NrmGrp ‚àß c1 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c0)))
  sylan(c0 ‚àà NrmGrp, c1 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c0), (c0[|`s]c1)‚àà MetSp, c0 ‚àà MetSp)
  ngpms(c0)
  ressms(c0, c1, (SubGrp ` c0))
  ralrimivva(hs0, hs1, (Base ` c2), (Base ` c2), (c0 ‚àà NrmGrp ‚àß c1 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c0)), (hs0[(dist ` c2)]hs1)=((norm ` c2)`(hs0[(-g ` c2)]hs1)))
  3eqtr4d((hs0[(dist ` c2)]hs1), ((norm ` c2)`(hs0[(-g ` c2)]hs1)), ((norm ` c0)`(hs0[(-g ` c0)]hs1)), ((norm ` c0)`(hs0[(-g ` c2)]hs1)), ((c0 ‚àà NrmGrp ‚àß c1 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c0))‚àß(hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c2)‚àß hs1 ‚àà(Base ` c2))))
  fveq2d((norm ` c0), (hs0[(-g ` c0)]hs1), (hs0[(-g ` c2)]hs1), ((c0 ‚àà NrmGrp ‚àß c1 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c0))‚àß(hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c2)‚àß hs1 ‚àà(Base ` c2))))
  syl3anc(((c0 ‚àà NrmGrp ‚àß c1 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c0))‚àß(hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c2)‚àß hs1 ‚àà(Base ` c2))), (hs0[(-g ` c0)]hs1)=(hs0[(-g ` c2)]hs1), c1 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c0), hs0 ‚àà c1, hs1 ‚àà c1)
  subgsub(c1, c0, hs0, hs1, (-g ` c0), (-g ` c2), c2)
  eqtr3d((hs0[(dist ` c2)]hs1), ((norm ` c0)`(hs0[(-g ` c0)]hs1)), (hs0[(dist ` c0)]hs1), ((c0 ‚àà NrmGrp ‚àß c1 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c0))‚àß(hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c2)‚àß hs1 ‚àà(Base ` c2))))
  oveqd(hs0, (dist ` c0), hs1, (dist ` c2), ((c0 ‚àà NrmGrp ‚àß c1 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c0))‚àß(hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c2)‚àß hs1 ‚àà(Base ` c2))))

blocks.name: ngptgp
blocks.content: A normed abelian group is a topological group (with the topology induced by the metric induced by the norm). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Oct-2015.)

blocks.content: Property deduction for a normed group. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Oct-2015.)

thm ngppropd(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c1, cngp)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c1)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s1), c2))), wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(s1))))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cres(cfv(cds, c0), cxp(c2, c2)), cres(cfv(cds, c1), cxp(c2, c2))))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(ctopn, c0), cfv(ctopn, c1)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  3bitr4g(w0, wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c1, cngp), w3a(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c0, cms), wceq(ccom(cfv(cnm, c0), cfv(csg, c0)), cres(cfv(cds, c0), cxp(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0))))), w3a(wcel(c1, cgrp), wcel(c1, cms), wceq(ccom(cfv(cnm, c1), cfv(csg, c1)), cres(cfv(cds, c1), cxp(cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cbs, c1))))))
  3bitr4g(w0, w3a(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c0, cms), wceq(ccom(cfv(cnm, c0), cfv(csg, c0)), cres(cfv(cds, c0), cxp(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0))))), w3a(wcel(c1, cgrp), wcel(c1, cms), wceq(ccom(cfv(cnm, c1), cfv(csg, c1)), cres(cfv(cds, c1), cxp(cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cbs, c1))))), wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wa(wcel(c0, cms), wceq(ccom(cfv(cnm, c0), cfv(csg, c0)), cres(cfv(cds, c0), cxp(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0)))))), wa(wcel(c1, cgrp), wa(wcel(c1, cms), wceq(ccom(cfv(cnm, c1), cfv(csg, c1)), cres(cfv(cds, c1), cxp(cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cbs, c1)))))))
  bitrd(w0, wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wa(wcel(c0, cms), wceq(ccom(cfv(cnm, c0), cfv(csg, c0)), cres(cfv(cds, c0), cxp(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0)))))), wa(wcel(c1, cgrp), wa(wcel(c1, cms), wceq(ccom(cfv(cnm, c1), cfv(csg, c1)), cres(cfv(cds, c1), cxp(cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cbs, c1)))))), wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wa(wcel(c1, cms), wceq(ccom(cfv(cnm, c1), cfv(csg, c1)), cres(cfv(cds, c1), cxp(cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cbs, c1)))))))
  pm5.32da(w0, wcel(c0, cgrp), wa(wcel(c0, cms), wceq(ccom(cfv(cnm, c0), cfv(csg, c0)), cres(cfv(cds, c0), cxp(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0))))), wa(wcel(c1, cms), wceq(ccom(cfv(cnm, c1), cfv(csg, c1)), cres(cfv(cds, c1), cxp(cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cbs, c1))))))
  anbi12d(wa(w0, wcel(c0, cgrp)), wcel(c0, cms), wceq(ccom(cfv(cnm, c0), cfv(csg, c0)), cres(cfv(cds, c0), cxp(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0)))), wcel(c1, cms), wceq(ccom(cfv(cnm, c1), cfv(csg, c1)), cres(cfv(cds, c1), cxp(cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cbs, c1)))))
  adantr(w0, wcel(c0, cgrp), wb(wcel(c0, cms), wcel(c1, cms)))
  mspropd(c0, c1, c2, w0)
  eqeq12d(ccom(cfv(cnm, c0), cfv(csg, c0)), cres(cfv(cds, c0), cxp(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0))), ccom(cfv(cnm, c1), cfv(csg, c1)), cres(cfv(cds, c1), cxp(cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cbs, c1))), wa(w0, wcel(c0, cgrp)))
  coeq12d(cfv(cnm, c0), cfv(csg, c0), cfv(cnm, c1), cfv(csg, c1), wa(w0, wcel(c0, cgrp)))
  nmpropd2(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, wa(w0, wcel(c0, cgrp)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(c0, cgrp), wceq(cres(cfv(cds, c0), cxp(c2, c2)), cres(cfv(cds, c1), cxp(c2, c2))))
  grpsubpropd2(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, wa(w0, wcel(c0, cgrp)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(c0, cgrp), wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(c0, cgrp), wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c1)))
  simpr(w0, wcel(c0, cgrp))
  adantlr(w0, wcel(c0, cgrp), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s1), c2)), wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(s1))))
  adantr(w0, wcel(c0, cgrp), wceq(cres(cfv(cds, c0), cxp(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0))), cres(cfv(cds, c1), cxp(cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cbs, c1)))))
  3eqtr3d(cres(cfv(cds, c0), cxp(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0))), cres(cfv(cds, c1), cxp(cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cbs, c1))), cres(cfv(cds, c0), cxp(c2, c2)), cres(cfv(cds, c1), cxp(c2, c2)), w0)
  reseq2d(cfv(cds, c0), cxp(c2, c2), cxp(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0)), w0)
  sqxpeqd(c2, cfv(cbs, c0), w0)
  reseq2d(cfv(cds, c1), cxp(c2, c2), cxp(cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cbs, c1)), w0)
  sqxpeqd(c2, cfv(cbs, c1), w0)
  anbi1d(w0, wcel(c0, cgrp), wa(wcel(c1, cms), wceq(ccom(cfv(cnm, c1), cfv(csg, c1)), cres(cfv(cds, c1), cxp(cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cbs, c1))))), wcel(c1, cgrp))
  grppropd(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, w0)
  3anass(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c0, cms), wceq(ccom(cfv(cnm, c0), cfv(csg, c0)), cres(cfv(cds, c0), cxp(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0)))))
  3anass(wcel(c1, cgrp), wcel(c1, cms), wceq(ccom(cfv(cnm, c1), cfv(csg, c1)), cres(cfv(cds, c1), cxp(cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cbs, c1)))))
  isngp2(c0, cfv(cnm, c0), cfv(csg, c0), cres(cfv(cds, c0), cxp(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0))), cfv(cds, c0), cfv(cbs, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cnm, c0))
  eqid(cfv(csg, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cds, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c0))
  eqid(cres(cfv(cds, c0), cxp(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0))))
  isngp2(c1, cfv(cnm, c1), cfv(csg, c1), cres(cfv(cds, c1), cxp(cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cbs, c1))), cfv(cds, c1), cfv(cbs, c1))
  eqid(cfv(cnm, c1))
  eqid(cfv(csg, c1))
  eqid(cfv(cds, c1))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c1))
  eqid(cres(cfv(cds, c1), cxp(cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cbs, c1))))
  diff.wa.s(s0, w0, wcel(c0, cgrp))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, cgrp)
  diff.cgrp.s(s0)
  diff.wa.s(s1, w0, wcel(c0, cgrp))
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c0, cgrp)
  diff.cgrp.s(s1)

thm ngppropd(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 ‚àà NrmGrp ‚Üî c1 ‚àà NrmGrp))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 =(Base ` c0))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 =(Base ` c1))
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß(s0 ‚àà c2 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c2))‚Üí(s0[(+ ` c0)]s1)=(s0[(+ ` c1)]s1))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí((dist ` c0)|`(c2 √ó c2))=((dist ` c1)|`(c2 √ó c2)))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(TopOpen ` c0)=(TopOpen ` c1))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, w0)
} = {

thm tnglem(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {

  tngval(c3, universe, c0, c1, c4, ccom(c0, cfv(csg, c3)), cfv(cmopn, ccom(c0, cfv(csg, c3))), cfv(csg, c3))
  eqid(cfv(csg, c3))
  eqid(ccom(c0, cfv(csg, c3)))
  eqid(cfv(cmopn, ccom(c0, cfv(csg, c3))))
  eqtri(cfv(c2, c3), cfv(c2, co(co(c3, csts, cop(cfv(cds, cnx), ccom(c0, cfv(csg, c3)))), csts, cop(cfv(cts, cnx), cfv(cmopn, ccom(c0, cfv(csg, c3)))))), cfv(c2, co(c3, csts, cop(cfv(cds, cnx), ccom(c0, cfv(csg, c3))))))

  mp2an(wbr(cfv(c2, cnx), clt, cdc(nat1, nat2)), wbr(cfv(c2, cnx), clt, nat9), wbr(nat9, clt, cdc(nat1, nat2)))

  9nn0()
  9lt10()
  lttri(cfv(c2, cnx), nat9, cdc(nat1, nat2))
  9re()
  nn0rei(cdc(nat1, nat2))
  deccl(nat1, nat2)
  1nn0()
  2nn0()
  dsndx()
  setsnid(c2, co(c3, csts, cop(cfv(cds, cnx), ccom(c0, cfv(csg, c3)))), cfv(cts, cnx), cfv(cmopn, ccom(c0, cfv(csg, c3))))
  ndxid(c2, c5)

  eqeltri(cfv(c2, cnx), cr, c5)

  3eqtr4a(cfv(c2, c3), cfv(c2, c4), emptycls, cfv(c2, emptycls), wa(wn(wcel(c3, universe)), wcel(c0, c1)))
  str0(c2, c5)

  adantr(wn(wcel(c3, universe)), wcel(c0, c1), wceq(co(c3, ctng, c0), emptycls))

blocks.name: tngngp2
blocks.content: A norm turns a group into a normed group iff the generated metric is in fact a metric. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Oct-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm tngngp2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wf(c0, c1, cr), wb(wcel(c2, cngp), wa(wcel(c3, cgrp), wcel(c4, cfv(cmet, c1)))))
  -| wceq(c2, co(c3, ctng, c0))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c3))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cds, c2))
} = {
  impbida(wf(c0, c1, cr), wcel(c2, cngp), wa(wcel(c3, cgrp), wcel(c4, cfv(cmet, c1))))
  jca(wa(wf(c0, c1, cr), wcel(c2, cngp)), wcel(c3, cgrp), wcel(c4, cfv(cmet, c1)))
  3eltr4d(c4, cfv(cmet, c1), cres(c4, cxp(cfv(cbs, c2), cfv(cbs, c2))), cfv(cmet, cfv(cbs, c2)), wa(wf(c0, c1, cr), wcel(c2, cngp)))
  syl(wa(wf(c0, c1, cr), wcel(c2, cngp)), wcel(cres(c4, cxp(cfv(cbs, c2), cfv(cbs, c2))), cfv(cmet, cfv(cbs, c2))), wcel(c2, cms))
  adantl(wf(c0, c1, cr), wcel(c2, cngp), wcel(c2, cms))
  ngpms(c2)
  msmet2(c2, c4, cfv(cbs, c2))
  eqtr3d(c4, cres(c4, cxp(cfv(cbs, c2), cfv(cbs, c2))), cres(c4, cxp(c1, c1)), wa(wf(c0, c1, cr), wcel(c2, cngp)))
  3syl(wa(wf(c0, c1, cr), wcel(c2, cngp)), wceq(cres(c4, cxp(c1, c1)), c4), wf(c4, cxp(c1, c1), cr), wfn(c4, cxp(c1, c1)))
  mpbird(wa(wf(c0, c1, cr), wcel(c2, cngp)), wf(c4, cxp(c1, c1), cr), wf(ccom(c0, cfv(csg, c3)), cxp(c1, c1), cr))
  syldan(wf(c0, c1, cr), wcel(c2, cngp), wf(ccom(c0, cfv(csg, c3)), cxp(c1, c1), cr), wf(cfv(csg, c3), cxp(c1, c1), c1))
  syl(wa(wf(c0, c1, cr), wcel(c2, cngp)), wf(cfv(csg, c3), cxp(c1, c1), c1), wcel(c3, cgrp))
  imp(wf(c0, c1, cr), wcel(c2, cngp), wcel(c3, cgrp))
  syl5ibr(wf(c0, c1, cr), wcel(c2, cngp), wcel(c3, cgrp), wcel(c2, cgrp))
  ngpgrp(c2)

blocks.name: tngngpd
blocks.content: Derive the axioms for a normed group from the axioms for a metric space. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Oct-2015.)

thm tngngpd(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cngp))
  -| wceq(c0, co(c1, ctng, c2))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c1))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(csg, c1))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(c0g, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cgrp))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c2, c3, cr))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c3)), wb(wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), nat0), wceq(cv(s0), c5)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c3), wcel(cv(s1), c3))), wbr(cfv(c2, co(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1))), cle, co(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), caddc, cfv(c2, cv(s1)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wcel(c0, cngp)), diffsc(s0, c0))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wcel(c0, cngp)), diffsc(s1, c0))
  mpbir2and(w0, wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c1, cgrp), wcel(cfv(cds, c0), cfv(cmet, c3)))
  eqeltrrd(cfv(cds, c0), cfv(cmet, c3), ccom(c2, c4), w0)
  3syl(w0, wceq(ccom(c2, c4), cfv(cds, c0)), wf(c2, c3, cr), wcel(c2, universe))
  mp3an23(wf(c2, c3, cr), wcel(c2, universe), wcel(c3, universe), wcel(cr, universe))
  fvexi(c3, cbs, c1)
  reex()
  fex2(c2, c3, cr, universe, universe)
  tngds(c2, universe, c4, c0, c1)
  nrmmetd(s0, s1, c2, c4, c3, c1, c5, w0)
  syl(w0, wb(wcel(c0, cngp), wa(wcel(c1, cgrp), wcel(cfv(cds, c0), cfv(cmet, c3)))), wf(c2, c3, cr))
  tngngp2(c2, c3, c0, c1, cfv(cds, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cds, c0))
}

thm tngngpd(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà NrmGrp)
  ‚ä£ c0 =(c1[toNrmGrp]c2)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(Base ` c1)
  ‚ä£ c4 =(-g ` c1)
  ‚ä£ c5 =(0 ` c1)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà Grp)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(c2 : c3 ‚Üí ‚Ñù))
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c3)‚Üí((c2 ` s0)= 0 ‚Üî s0 = c5))
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß(s0 ‚àà c3 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c3))‚Üí(c2 `(s0[c4]s1))[‚â§]((c2 ` s0)[+](c2 ` s1)))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c5)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c5)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  a1ii((w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà NrmGrp), d(s0, c0))
  a1ii((w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà NrmGrp), d(s1, c0))
  mpbir2and(w0, c0 ‚àà NrmGrp, c1 ‚àà Grp, (dist ` c0)‚àà(Met ` c3))
  eqeltrrd((dist ` c0), (Met ` c3), (c2 ‚àò c4), w0)
  3syl(w0, (c2 ‚àò c4)=(dist ` c0), (c2 : c3 ‚Üí ‚Ñù), c2 ‚àà ùïå)
  mp3an23((c2 : c3 ‚Üí ‚Ñù), c2 ‚àà ùïå, c3 ‚àà ùïå, ‚Ñù ‚àà ùïå)
  fvexi(c3, cbs, c1)
  reex()
  fex2(c2, c3, cr, universe, universe)
  tngds(c2, universe, c4, c0, c1)
  nrmmetd(s0, s1, c2, c4, c3, c1, c5, w0)
  syl(w0, (c0 ‚àà NrmGrp ‚Üî(c1 ‚àà Grp ‚àß(dist ` c0)‚àà(Met ` c3))), (c2 : c3 ‚Üí ‚Ñù))
  tngngp2(c2, c3, c0, c1, (dist ` c0))
  eqid((dist ` c0))
}

blocks.name: tngngp
blocks.content: Derive the axioms for a normed group from the axioms for a metric space. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Oct-2015.)

  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
} = {

  jca(wa(wa(wf(c0, c1, cr), wcel(c2, cngp)), wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wb(wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), nat0), wceq(cv(s0), c4)), wral(s1, c1, wbr(cfv(c0, co(cv(s0), c5, cv(s1))), cle, co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), caddc, cfv(c0, cv(s1))))))
  3bitr4d(wa(wa(wf(c0, c1, cr), wcel(c2, cngp)), wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), nat0), wceq(cv(s0), c4), wceq(cfv(cfv(cnm, c2), cv(s0)), nat0), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0g, c2)))

blocks.name: tnggrpr
blocks.content: If a structure equipped with a norm is a normed group, the structure itself must be a group. (Contributed by AV, 15-Oct-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm tnggrpr(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cngp)), wcel(c3, cgrp))
  -| wceq(c2, co(c3, ctng, c0))
} = {
  impel(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cngp), wcel(c3, cgrp), wcel(c2, cgrp))
  biimpd(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cgrp), wcel(c3, cgrp))
  grppropd(hs0, hs1, c2, c3, cfv(cbs, c3), wcel(c0, c1))
  tngbas(c0, c1, cfv(cbs, c3), c2, c3)
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c3))
  eqidd(cfv(cbs, c3), wcel(c0, c1))
  oveqdr(hs0, hs1, cfv(cplusg, c2), cfv(cplusg, c3), wcel(c0, c1), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c3)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c3))))
  eqcomd(cfv(cplusg, c2), cfv(cplusg, c3), wcel(c0, c1))
  tngplusg(c0, c1, cfv(cplusg, c3), c2, c3)
  eqid(cfv(cplusg, c3))
  ngpgrp(c2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cbs, c3))
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(cbs, c3))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, c1))
  diff.hs1.w(wcel(c0, c1))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm tnggrpr(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà NrmGrp)‚Üí c3 ‚àà Grp)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(c3[toNrmGrp]c0)
} = {
  impel(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà NrmGrp, c3 ‚àà Grp, c2 ‚àà Grp)
  biimpd(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà Grp, c3 ‚àà Grp)
  grppropd(hs0, hs1, c2, c3, (Base ` c3), c0 ‚àà c1)
  tngbas(c0, c1, (Base ` c3), c2, c3)
  eqid((Base ` c3))
  eqidd((Base ` c3), c0 ‚àà c1)
  oveqdr(hs0, hs1, (+ ` c2), (+ ` c3), c0 ‚àà c1, (hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c3)‚àß hs1 ‚àà(Base ` c3)))
  eqcomd((+ ` c2), (+ ` c3), c0 ‚àà c1)
  tngplusg(c0, c1, (+ ` c3), c2, c3)
  eqid((+ ` c3))
  ngpgrp(c2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c((Base ` c3))
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c((Base ` c3))
  diff.hs0.w(c0 ‚àà c1)
  diff.hs1.w(c0 ‚àà c1)
}

blocks.name: tngngp3
blocks.content: Alternate definition of a normed group (i.e. a group equipped with a norm) without using the properties of a metric space. This corresponds to the definition in N. H. Bingham, A. J. Ostaszewski: "Normed versus topological groups: dichotomy and duality", 2010, Dissertationes Mathematicae 472, pp. 1-138 and E. Deza, M.M. Deza: "Dictionary of Distances", Elsevier, 2006. (Contributed by AV, 16-Oct-2021.)

blocks.name: nrmtngdist
blocks.content: The augmentation of a normed group by its own norm has the same distance function as the normed group (restricted to the base set). (Contributed by AV, 15-Oct-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm nrmtngdist(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cngp), wceq(cfv(cds, c1), cres(cfv(cds, c0), cxp(c2, c2))))
  -| wceq(c1, co(c0, ctng, cfv(cnm, c0)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
} = {
  syl5eqr(cfv(cds, c1), cres(cfv(cds, c0), cxp(c2, c2)), ccom(cfv(cnm, c0), cfv(csg, c0)), wcel(c0, cngp))
  ax-mp(wceq(ccom(cfv(cnm, c0), cfv(csg, c0)), cfv(cds, c1)), wcel(cfv(cnm, c0), universe))
  fvex(cnm, c0)
  tngds(cfv(cnm, c0), universe, cfv(csg, c0), c1, c0)
  simp3bi(wcel(c0, cngp), wceq(ccom(cfv(cnm, c0), cfv(csg, c0)), cres(cfv(cds, c0), cxp(c2, c2))), wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c0, cms))
  isngp2(c0, cfv(cnm, c0), cfv(csg, c0), cres(cfv(cds, c0), cxp(c2, c2)), cfv(cds, c0), c2)
  eqid(cfv(cnm, c0))
  eqid(cfv(csg, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cds, c0))
  eqid(cres(cfv(cds, c0), cxp(c2, c2)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm nrmtngdist(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà NrmGrp ‚Üí(dist ` c1)=((dist ` c0)|`(c2 √ó c2)))
  ‚ä£ c1 =(c0[toNrmGrp](norm ` c0))
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Base ` c0)
} = {
  syl5eqr((dist ` c1), ((dist ` c0)|`(c2 √ó c2)), ((norm ` c0)‚àò(-g ` c0)), c0 ‚àà NrmGrp)
  ax-mp(((norm ` c0)‚àò(-g ` c0))=(dist ` c1), (norm ` c0)‚àà ùïå)
  fvex(cnm, c0)
  tngds((norm ` c0), universe, (-g ` c0), c1, c0)
  simp3bi(c0 ‚àà NrmGrp, ((norm ` c0)‚àò(-g ` c0))=((dist ` c0)|`(c2 √ó c2)), c0 ‚àà Grp, c0 ‚àà MetSp)
  isngp2(c0, (norm ` c0), (-g ` c0), ((dist ` c0)|`(c2 √ó c2)), (dist ` c0), c2)
  eqid((norm ` c0))
  eqid((-g ` c0))
  eqid((dist ` c0))
  eqid(((dist ` c0)|`(c2 √ó c2)))
}

blocks.name: nrmtngnrm
blocks.content: The augmentation of a normed group by its own norm is a normed group with the same norm. (Contributed by AV, 15-Oct-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm nrmtngnrm(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cngp), wa(wcel(c1, cngp), wceq(cfv(cnm, c1), cfv(cnm, c0))))
  -| wceq(c1, co(c0, ctng, cfv(cnm, c0)))
} = {
  jca(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c1, cngp), wceq(cfv(cnm, c1), cfv(cnm, c0)))
  mpbir2and(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c1, cngp), wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(cfv(cds, c1), cfv(cmet, cfv(cbs, c0))))
  eqeltrd(cfv(cds, c1), cfv(cmet, cfv(cbs, c0)), cres(cfv(cds, c0), cxp(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0))), wcel(c0, cngp))
  nrmtngdist(c0, c1, cfv(cbs, c0))
  ngpmet(c0, cres(cfv(cds, c0), cxp(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0))), cfv(cbs, c0))
  eqid(cres(cfv(cds, c0), cxp(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0))))
  syl(wcel(c0, cngp), wb(wcel(c1, cngp), wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(cfv(cds, c1), cfv(cmet, cfv(cbs, c0))))), wf(cfv(cnm, c0), cfv(cbs, c0), cr))
  tngngp2(cfv(cnm, c0), cfv(cbs, c0), c1, c0, cfv(cds, c1))
  eqid(cfv(cds, c1))
  eqcomd(cfv(cnm, c1), cfv(cnm, c0), wcel(c0, cngp))
  syl(wcel(c0, cngp), wceq(cfv(cnm, c0), cfv(cnm, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wf(cfv(cnm, c0), cfv(cbs, c0), cr)))
  jca(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c0, cgrp), wf(cfv(cnm, c0), cfv(cbs, c0), cr))
  ngpgrp(c0)
  nmf(c0, cfv(cnm, c0), cfv(cbs, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cnm, c0))
  tngnm(c0, cfv(cnm, c0), cfv(cbs, c0), cr, c1)
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c0))
  reex()
}
blocks.pretty:
thm nrmtngnrm(class c0, class c1) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà NrmGrp ‚Üí(c1 ‚àà NrmGrp ‚àß(norm ` c1)=(norm ` c0)))
  ‚ä£ c1 =(c0[toNrmGrp](norm ` c0))
} = {
  jca(c0 ‚àà NrmGrp, c1 ‚àà NrmGrp, (norm ` c1)=(norm ` c0))
  mpbir2and(c0 ‚àà NrmGrp, c1 ‚àà NrmGrp, c0 ‚àà Grp, (dist ` c1)‚àà(Met `(Base ` c0)))
  eqeltrd((dist ` c1), (Met `(Base ` c0)), ((dist ` c0)|`((Base ` c0)√ó(Base ` c0))), c0 ‚àà NrmGrp)
  nrmtngdist(c0, c1, (Base ` c0))
  ngpmet(c0, ((dist ` c0)|`((Base ` c0)√ó(Base ` c0))), (Base ` c0))
  eqid(((dist ` c0)|`((Base ` c0)√ó(Base ` c0))))
  syl(c0 ‚àà NrmGrp, (c1 ‚àà NrmGrp ‚Üî(c0 ‚àà Grp ‚àß(dist ` c1)‚àà(Met `(Base ` c0)))), ((norm ` c0):(Base ` c0)‚Üí ‚Ñù))
  tngngp2((norm ` c0), (Base ` c0), c1, c0, (dist ` c1))
  eqid((dist ` c1))
  eqcomd((norm ` c1), (norm ` c0), c0 ‚àà NrmGrp)
  syl(c0 ‚àà NrmGrp, (norm ` c0)=(norm ` c1), (c0 ‚àà Grp ‚àß((norm ` c0):(Base ` c0)‚Üí ‚Ñù)))
  jca(c0 ‚àà NrmGrp, c0 ‚àà Grp, ((norm ` c0):(Base ` c0)‚Üí ‚Ñù))
  ngpgrp(c0)
  nmf(c0, (norm ` c0), (Base ` c0))
  eqid((norm ` c0))
  tngnm(c0, (norm ` c0), (Base ` c0), cr, c1)
  eqid((Base ` c0))
  reex()
}

blocks.name: tngngpim
blocks.content: The induced metric of a normed group is a function. (Contributed by AV, 19-Oct-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm tngngpim(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cngp), wf(c1, cxp(c2, c2), cr))
  -| wceq(c3, co(c0, ctng, c4))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cnm, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cds, c3))
} = {
  mpd(wcel(c0, cngp), wf(c1, cxp(c2, c2), cr), wf(c4, c2, cr))
  nmf(c0, c4, c2)
  syl6(wcel(c0, cngp), wf(c4, c2, cr), wf(c1, cxp(c2, c2), cr), wcel(c1, cfv(cmet, c2)))
  syl(wcel(c0, cngp), wi(wf(c4, c2, cr), wcel(c1, cfv(cmet, c2))), wa(wcel(c3, cngp), wceq(cfv(cnm, c3), cfv(cnm, c0))))
  nrmtngnrm(c0, c3)
  eqtri(c3, co(c0, ctng, cfv(cnm, c0)), co(c0, ctng, c4))
  oveq2i(c0, ctng, c4, cfv(cnm, c0))
  adantr(wcel(c3, cngp), wceq(cfv(cnm, c3), cfv(cnm, c0)), wi(wf(c4, c2, cr), wcel(c1, cfv(cmet, c2))))
  com12(wcel(c3, cngp), wf(c4, c2, cr), wcel(c1, cfv(cmet, c2)))
  syl6bi(wf(c4, c2, cr), wcel(c3, cngp), wcel(c1, cfv(cmet, c2)), wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, cfv(cmet, c2))))
  tngngp2(c4, c2, c3, c0, c1)
  simpr(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, cfv(cmet, c2)))
  metf(c1, c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm tngngpim(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà NrmGrp ‚Üí(c1 :(c2 √ó c2)‚Üí ‚Ñù))
  ‚ä£ c3 =(c0[toNrmGrp]c4)
  ‚ä£ c4 =(norm ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(dist ` c3)
} = {
  mpd(c0 ‚àà NrmGrp, (c1 :(c2 √ó c2)‚Üí ‚Ñù), (c4 : c2 ‚Üí ‚Ñù))
  nmf(c0, c4, c2)
  syl6(c0 ‚àà NrmGrp, (c4 : c2 ‚Üí ‚Ñù), (c1 :(c2 √ó c2)‚Üí ‚Ñù), c1 ‚àà(Met ` c2))
  syl(c0 ‚àà NrmGrp, ((c4 : c2 ‚Üí ‚Ñù)‚Üí c1 ‚àà(Met ` c2)), (c3 ‚àà NrmGrp ‚àß(norm ` c3)=(norm ` c0)))
  nrmtngnrm(c0, c3)
  eqtri(c3, (c0[toNrmGrp](norm ` c0)), (c0[toNrmGrp]c4))
  oveq2i(c0, ctng, c4, (norm ` c0))
  adantr(c3 ‚àà NrmGrp, (norm ` c3)=(norm ` c0), ((c4 : c2 ‚Üí ‚Ñù)‚Üí c1 ‚àà(Met ` c2)))
  com12(c3 ‚àà NrmGrp, (c4 : c2 ‚Üí ‚Ñù), c1 ‚àà(Met ` c2))
  syl6bi((c4 : c2 ‚Üí ‚Ñù), c3 ‚àà NrmGrp, c1 ‚àà(Met ` c2), (c0 ‚àà Grp ‚àß c1 ‚àà(Met ` c2)))
  tngngp2(c4, c2, c3, c0, c1)
  simpr(c0 ‚àà Grp, c1 ‚àà(Met ` c2))
  metf(c1, c2)
}

blocks.name: isnrg
blocks.content: A normed ring is a ring with a norm that makes it into a normed group, and such that the norm is an absolute value on the ring. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Oct-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm isnrg(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, cnrg), wa(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c1, c2)))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cnm, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cabv, c0))
} = {
  elrab2(hs0, c0, cnrg, cngp, wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cfv(cnm, cv(hs0)), cfv(cabv, cv(hs0))))
  eleq12d(cfv(cnm, cv(hs0)), cfv(cabv, cv(hs0)), c1, c2, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cnm, cv(hs0)), c1, cfv(cnm, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, cnm)
  syl6eqr(cfv(cabv, cv(hs0)), c2, cfv(cabv, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, cabv)
  df-nrg(hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cngp)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c1, c2))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm isnrg(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà NrmRing ‚Üî(c0 ‚àà NrmGrp ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2))
  ‚ä£ c1 =(norm ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(AbsVal ` c0)
} = {
  elrab2(hs0, c0, cnrg, cngp, c1 ‚àà c2, (norm ` hs0)‚àà(AbsVal ` hs0))
  eleq12d((norm ` hs0), (AbsVal ` hs0), c1, c2, hs0 = c0)
  syl6eqr((norm ` hs0), c1, (norm ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, cnm)
  syl6eqr((AbsVal ` hs0), c2, (AbsVal ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, cabv)
  df-nrg(hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cngp)
  diff.hs0.w(c1 ‚àà c2)
}

blocks.name: nrgdsdi
blocks.content: Distribute a distance calculation. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 5-Oct-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm nrgdsdi(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cnrg), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))), wceq(co(cfv(c5, c1), cmul, co(c3, c6, c4)), co(co(c1, c7, c3), c6, co(c1, c7, c4))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cnm, c0))
  -| wceq(c7, cfv(cmulr, c0))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cds, c0))
} = {
  3eqtr4d(co(cfv(c5, c1), cmul, co(c3, c6, c4)), co(co(c1, c7, c3), c6, co(c1, c7, c4)), co(cfv(c5, c1), cmul, cfv(c5, co(c3, cfv(csg, c0), c4))), cfv(c5, co(co(c1, c7, c3), cfv(csg, c0), co(c1, c7, c4))), wa(wcel(c0, cnrg), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))))
  eqtr3d(co(cfv(c5, c1), cmul, cfv(c5, co(c3, cfv(csg, c0), c4))), cfv(c5, co(co(c1, c7, c3), cfv(csg, c0), co(c1, c7, c4))), cfv(c5, co(c1, c7, co(c3, cfv(csg, c0), c4))), wa(wcel(c0, cnrg), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))))
  syl3anc(wa(wcel(c0, cnrg), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))), wceq(cfv(c5, co(c1, c7, co(c3, cfv(csg, c0), c4))), co(cfv(c5, c1), cmul, cfv(c5, co(c3, cfv(csg, c0), c4)))), wcel(c0, cnrg), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(co(c3, cfv(csg, c0), c4), c2))
  simpl(wcel(c0, cnrg), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2)))
  syl3anc(wa(wcel(c0, cnrg), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))), wcel(co(c3, cfv(csg, c0), c4), c2), wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cnrg), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))), wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c0, crg))
  ringgrp(c0)
  grpsubcl(c0, c3, c2, c4, cfv(csg, c0))

blocks.name: nrgdomn
blocks.content: A nonzero normed ring is a domain. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Oct-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm nrgdomn(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cnrg), wb(wcel(c0, cdomn), wcel(c0, cnzr)))
} = {
  impbid2(wcel(c0, cnrg), wcel(c0, cdomn), wcel(c0, cnzr))
  domnnzr(c0)
  ex(wcel(c0, cnrg), wcel(c0, cnzr), wcel(c0, cdomn))
  sylanbrc(wa(wcel(c0, cnrg), wcel(c0, cnzr)), wcel(c0, cdomn), wcel(c0, cnzr), wne(cfv(cabv, c0), emptycls))
  simpr(wcel(c0, cnrg), wcel(c0, cnzr))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cnrg), wcel(c0, cnzr), wne(cfv(cabv, c0), emptycls))
  ne0d(cfv(cabv, c0), cfv(cnm, c0), wcel(c0, cnrg))
  nrgabv(c0, cfv(cnm, c0), cfv(cabv, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cnm, c0))
  abvn0b(c0, cfv(cabv, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cabv, c0))
}

  simpr(c0 ‚àà NrmRing, c0 ‚àà NzRing)

blocks.name: nrgtgp

blocks.name: subrgnrg
blocks.content: A normed ring restricted to a subring is a normed ring. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Oct-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm subrgnrg(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cnrg), wcel(c1, cfv(csubrg, c0))), wcel(c2, cnrg))
  -| wceq(c2, co(c0, cress, c1))
} = {
  sylanbrc(wa(wcel(c0, cnrg), wcel(c1, cfv(csubrg, c0))), wcel(c2, cnrg), wcel(c2, cngp), wcel(cfv(cnm, c2), cfv(cabv, c2)))
  syl2an(wcel(c0, cnrg), wcel(c1, cfv(csubrg, c0)), wcel(c2, cngp), wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c1, cfv(csubg, c0)))
  nrgngp(c0)
  subgngp(c0, c1, c2)
  eqeltrd(cfv(cnm, c2), cfv(cabv, c2), cres(cfv(cnm, c0), c1), wa(wcel(c0, cnrg), wcel(c1, cfv(csubrg, c0))))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cnrg), wcel(c1, cfv(csubrg, c0))), wceq(cfv(cnm, c2), cres(cfv(cnm, c0), c1)), wcel(c1, cfv(csubg, c0)))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cnrg), wcel(c1, cfv(csubrg, c0)), wcel(c1, cfv(csubg, c0)))
  subrgsubg(c1, c0)
  subgnm(c1, c0, cfv(cnm, c2), cfv(cnm, c0), c2)
  sylan(wcel(c0, cnrg), wcel(c1, cfv(csubrg, c0)), wcel(cres(cfv(cnm, c0), c1), cfv(cabv, c2)), wcel(cfv(cnm, c0), cfv(cabv, c0)))
  nrgabv(c0, cfv(cnm, c0), cfv(cabv, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cnm, c0))
  abvres(cfv(cnm, c0), cfv(cabv, c0), c1, c0, cfv(cabv, c2), c2)
  eqid(cfv(cabv, c0))
  isnrg(c2, cfv(cnm, c2), cfv(cabv, c2))
  eqid(cfv(cnm, c2))
  eqid(cfv(cabv, c2))
}

thm subrgnrg(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà NrmRing ‚àß c1 ‚àà(SubRing ` c0))‚Üí c2 ‚àà NrmRing)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(c0[|`s]c1)
} = {
  sylanbrc((c0 ‚àà NrmRing ‚àß c1 ‚àà(SubRing ` c0)), c2 ‚àà NrmRing, c2 ‚àà NrmGrp, (norm ` c2)‚àà(AbsVal ` c2))
  syl2an(c0 ‚àà NrmRing, c1 ‚àà(SubRing ` c0), c2 ‚àà NrmGrp, c0 ‚àà NrmGrp, c1 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c0))
  nrgngp(c0)
  subgngp(c0, c1, c2)
  eqeltrd((norm ` c2), (AbsVal ` c2), ((norm ` c0)|` c1), (c0 ‚àà NrmRing ‚àß c1 ‚àà(SubRing ` c0)))
  syl((c0 ‚àà NrmRing ‚àß c1 ‚àà(SubRing ` c0)), (norm ` c2)=((norm ` c0)|` c1), c1 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c0))
  adantl(c0 ‚àà NrmRing, c1 ‚àà(SubRing ` c0), c1 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c0))
  subrgsubg(c1, c0)
  subgnm(c1, c0, (norm ` c2), (norm ` c0), c2)
  sylan(c0 ‚àà NrmRing, c1 ‚àà(SubRing ` c0), ((norm ` c0)|` c1)‚àà(AbsVal ` c2), (norm ` c0)‚àà(AbsVal ` c0))
  nrgabv(c0, (norm ` c0), (AbsVal ` c0))

blocks.name: tngnrg
blocks.content: Given any absolute value over a ring, augmenting the ring with the absolute value produces a normed ring. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Oct-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm tngnrg(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cnrg))
  -| wceq(c2, co(c3, ctng, c0))

  sylanbrc(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cnrg), wcel(c2, cngp), wcel(cfv(cnm, c2), cfv(cabv, c2)))
  mpbir2and(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cngp), wcel(c3, cgrp), wcel(cfv(cds, c2), cfv(cmet, cfv(cbs, c3))))

  tngds(c0, c1, cfv(csg, c3), c2, c3)
  abvmet(c0, c1, cfv(csg, c3), cfv(cbs, c3), c3)
  eqid(cfv(csg, c3))

  tngngp2(c0, cfv(cbs, c3), c2, c3, cfv(cds, c2))
  eqid(cfv(cds, c2))
  ibi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cfv(cnm, c2), cfv(cabv, c2)))
  eleq12d(c0, c1, cfv(cnm, c2), cfv(cabv, c2), wcel(c0, c1))
  syl2anc(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c0, cfv(cnm, c2)), wcel(c3, cgrp), wf(c0, cfv(cbs, c3), cr))
  syl(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c3, cgrp), wcel(c3, crg))
  abvrcl(c0, c1, c3)
  ringgrp(c3)
  abvf(c0, c1, cfv(cbs, c3), c3)
  tngnm(c3, c0, cfv(cbs, c3), cr, c2)
  reex()
  syl5eq(c1, cfv(cabv, c2), cfv(cabv, c3), wcel(c0, c1))
  abvpropd(hs0, hs1, c3, c2, cfv(cbs, c3), wcel(c0, c1))

  tngbas(c0, c1, cfv(cbs, c3), c2, c3)
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c3))

  tngplusg(c0, c1, cfv(cplusg, c3), c2, c3)
  eqid(cfv(cplusg, c3))
  oveqdr(hs0, hs1, cfv(cmulr, c3), cfv(cmulr, c2), wcel(c0, c1), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c3)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c3))))
  tngmulr(c0, c1, cfv(cmulr, c3), c2, c3)
  eqid(cfv(cmulr, c3))
  isnrg(c2, cfv(cnm, c2), cfv(cabv, c2))
  eqid(cfv(cnm, c2))
  eqid(cfv(cabv, c2))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cbs, c3))
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(cbs, c3))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, c1))
  diff.hs1.w(wcel(c0, c1))
}
blocks.pretty:

  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà NrmRing)

blocks.name: nlmvscn
blocks.content: The scalar multiplication of a normed module is continuous. Lemma for ~ nrgtrg and ~ nlmtlm . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Oct-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm nlmvscn(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cnlm), wcel(c1, co(co(c2, ctx, c3), ccn, c3)))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(csca, c0))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cscaf, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(ctopn, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(ctopn, c4))

blocks.name: rlmnlm
blocks.content: The ring module over a normed ring is a normed module. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Oct-2015.)

blocks.name: rlmnm
blocks.content: The norm function in the ring module. (Contributed by AV, 9-Oct-2021.)

blocks.name: nrgtrg
blocks.content: A normed ring is a topological ring. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Oct-2015.)

blocks.name: nrginvrcn
blocks.content: The ring inverse function is continuous in a normed ring. (Note that this is true even in rings which are not division rings.) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 6-Oct-2015.)
blocks.origin:
